TEST_NAME: Redwood Buttons should be correctly placed
QUERY_CLOB:
with std as (select case when apb.display_position in ('Region Body', 'Body')
                         then case when apr.template not in ('Blank with Attributes','Collapsible','Cards Container')
                                   then 'BUTTON_RW_POSITION'
                                   end
                         end child_code,
                    apb.application_id,
                    apb.page_id,
                    null created_by,
                    null created_on,
                    apb.last_updated_by,
                    apb.last_updated_on,
                    apb.display_position_code,
                    apb.button_is_hot,
                    apb.display_position,
                    apb.button_name,
                    apb.button_id component_id,
                    apb.button_template,
                    apb.button_position,
                    apr.template,
                    aap.build_option,
                    abo.build_option_status,
                    abo.status_on_export,
						        apb.workspace
            from apex_application_page_buttons apb 
            inner join apex_application_page_regions apr on apb.application_id = apr.application_id
                                                         and apb.page_id = apr.page_id
                                                         and apb.region_id = apr.region_id
            inner join apex_application_pages aap on apb.application_id = aap.application_id
                                                  and apb.page_id = aap.page_id
            inner join apex_applications aa on apb.application_id = aa.application_id
                                            and aa.theme_number = 1000
            left outer join apex_application_build_options abo on abo.application_id = aap.application_id 
                                                               and abo.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                               and coalesce(abo.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
						where apb.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
)
select case when std.child_code is not null
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,
       std.application_id,
       std.page_id,
       std.created_by,
       std.created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       case when std.child_code is not null
            then apex_string.format ('Button `%0` (page %1, app %2) is in position `%3` but should be in a Redwood button position',
                            p0 => std.button_name,
                            p1 => std.page_id,
                            p2 => std.application_id,
                            p3 => std.display_position) 
            end validation_failure_message,
       case when std.child_code is not null
            then apex_string.format ('Button `%0` (page %1, app %2) is incorrectly placed',
                            p0 => std.button_name,
                            p1 => std.page_id,
                            p2 => std.application_id) 
            end issue_title,
	     std.child_code,
       std.button_is_hot,
       std.display_position,
       std.button_name,
       std.component_id,
			 null parent_component_id,
       std.button_template,
       std.button_position,
       std.template region_template,
       std.display_position_code,
			 std.workspace
from std
EXPLANATION: It is rarely correct to place Redwood buttons in the 'Region Body'/'Body' position.
FIX: Place the button in a Redwood, non-legacy position

TEST_NAME: Redwood Page Items should use Redwood Icons
QUERY_CLOB:
with std as (select case when ITEM_ICON_CSS_CLASSES like 'fa-%'
                         then 'N' 
                         else 'Y'
                         end pass_yn,
                    aapi.application_id, 
                    aapi.page_id,
                    null created_by,
                    null created_on,
                    aapi.last_updated_by,
                    aapi.last_updated_on,
                    aapi.item_id component_id,
                    null parent_component_id,
                    aapi.item_icon_css_classes,
                    aapi.item_name,
						        aapi.workspace
               from apex_application_page_items aapi
               inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapi.page_id and aap.application_id = aapi.application_id
               inner join apex_applications aa on aapi.application_id = aa.application_id
                                             and aa.theme_number = 1000
               left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
               left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapi.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapi.application_id
               where aapi.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
               and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
               and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude')
select std.pass_yn,
       std.application_id, 
       std.page_id,
       std.created_by,
       std.created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       case when std.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format('Page Item `%0` (page %1, app %2) uses a `Universal Theme` icon: `%3`. You must replace with a `Redwood` icon.',
                    p0 => std.item_name,
                    p1 => std.page_id,
                    p2 => std.application_id,
                    p3 => std.item_icon_css_classes
                    )
            end validation_failure_message,
       case when std.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format('Page Item `%0` (page %1, app %2) has an invalid icon',
                    p0 => std.item_name,
                    p1 => std.page_id,
                    p2 => std.application_id
                    )
            end issue_title,
       std.component_id,
       std.parent_component_id,
       std.item_icon_css_classes,
       std.item_name,
			 std.workspace
from std
EXPLANATION: Redwood Page Items cannot use Universal Theme icons
FIX: Replace the icon with a Redwood Icon

TEST_NAME: List Entries should use the correct icons
QUERY_CLOB:
with std as (select case when aale.entry_image like 'fa%'
                         then 'N'
                         else 'Y'
                         end pass_yn,
                    aale.application_id, 
                    null page_id,
                    null created_by,
                    null created_on,
                    aale.last_updated_by,
                    aale.last_updated_on,
                    aale.list_entry_id component_id,
                    aale.list_entry_parent_id parent_component_id,
                    aale.entry_image,
                    aale.entry_text,
						        aale.workspace
               from apex_application_list_entries aale
               inner join apex_applications aa on aale.application_id = aa.application_id
                                             and aa.theme_number = 1000
               left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aale.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aale.application_id
               where aale.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
               and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude')
select std.pass_yn,
       std.application_id, 
       std.page_id,
       std.created_by,
       std.created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       std.component_id,
       std.parent_component_id,
       std.entry_image,
       case when std.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format('List entry `%0` (app %1) uses a Univeral Theme icon (`%2`). You must use a Redwood icon.',
                    p0 => std.entry_text,
                    p1 => std.application_id,
                    p2 => std.entry_image
                    )
            end  validation_failure_message,
       case when std.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format('List entry `%0` (app %1) uses an invalid icon',
                    p0 => std.entry_text,
                    p1 => std.application_id
                    )
            end  issue_title, 
       std.entry_text,
			 std.workspace
from std
EXPLANATION: List entries must not use a Universal theme icon in the `entry_image` field
FIX: Replace the icon with a Redwood icon

TEST_NAME: Item Overview Regions should have an Icon or Initials
QUERY_CLOB:
select case when aapr.icon_css_classes is not null 
            then 'Y'
            when aapda.action_code in ('PLUGIN_REDWOOD_AVATAR','PLUGIN_REDWOOD_BADGE')
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       aapr.workspace,
       aapr.application_id, 
       aapr.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapr.last_updated_by,
       aapr.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) is misconfiguration : Icon `%3`, DA Action Code `%4`', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
        p3 => aapr.icon_css_classes,
        p4 => aapda.action_code) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) is misconfigured', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
       aapr.component_template_options,
       aapr.report_template,
       aapda.action_code,
       aapr.icon_css_classes
from apex_application_page_regions aapr
left outer join apex_application_page_da_acts aapda on aapr.application_id = aapda.application_id
                                                    and aapr.page_id = aapda.page_id
                                                    and aapr.region_id = aapda.affected_region_id
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id
                                      and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id
where aapr.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aapr.template = 'Item Overview'
EXPLANATION: Regions with the `Item Overview` template should have an Icon, Badge or Initials configured
FIX:
Either

1.  Provide a Redwood Icon in the Appearance > Icon field
2.  Configure a page load Dynamic Action with a `Redwood - Avatar`  or `Redwood - Badge` action. This Dynamic Action sets the requisite icon, badge or initials for the region

TEST_NAME: Toast regions with the custom icon setting should have an icon
QUERY_CLOB:
select case when aapr.icon_css_classes is null
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,
       aapr.workspace,
       aapr.application_id, 
       aapr.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapr.last_updated_by,
       aapr.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) is missing an icon: `%3`', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
        p3 => aapr.region_template_options) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) is missing an icon', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
       aapr.component_template_options,
       aapr.report_template,
       aapr.icon_css_classes,
       aapr.region_template_options
from apex_application_page_regions aapr
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id
                                      and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id
where aapr.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aapr.template = 'Toast'
and aapr.region_template_options like '%rw-Toast--customIcon%'
EXPLANATION: Toast regions with the `Custom` value for the `Icon` setting should have an icon specified in the `Icon` field
FIX: If the `Template Options`  > `Icon`  setting is set to `Custom` , you must specify a Redwood Icon in the `Appearance`  > `Icon`  field

TEST_NAME: Toast regions should only have links
QUERY_CLOB:
with std as (select application_id, page_id, region_id, count(*) btn_cnt
                from apex_application_page_buttons apb
                where apb.button_template != 'Link'
                group by application_id, page_id, region_id)
select case when std.btn_cnt is null
            then 'Y'
            when std.btn_cnt > 0
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       aapr.workspace,
       aapr.application_id, 
       aapr.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapr.last_updated_by,
       aapr.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2, template `%3`) should only have buttons of template `Link`', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) has misconfigured buttons', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
       aapr.component_template_options,
       aapr.report_template
from apex_application_page_regions aapr
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id
                                      and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id
left outer join std on  aapr.application_id = std.application_id
                    and aapr.page_id = std.page_id
                    and aapr.region_id = std.region_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id
where aapr.template = 'Toast'
and aapr.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION: Toast regions should only have buttons that a template of `Link`
FIX: Change the button template to `Link`

TEST_NAME: Region in "Item Overview" position is correctly configured

       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) has the wrong template : `%3`', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
        p3 => aapr.template) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) has the wrong template', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
       aapr.component_template_options,
       aapr.report_template,
			 aapr.workspace
from apex_application_page_regions aapr
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id
where aapr.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aapr.display_position = 'Item Overview'
EXPLANATION: Any region in the `Item Overview` display position should have a template of `Item Overview`
FIX: Correct the display position or template

TEST_NAME: Banner regions are correctly configured
QUERY_CLOB:
select case when aapr.template in ('Welcome Banner', 'Banner Message', 'Panel', 'Blank with Attributes (No Grid)', 'Collection Toolbar')
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,                          
       aapr.application_id, 
       aapr.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapr.last_updated_by,
       aapr.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) has the wrong template : `%3`', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
        p3 => aapr.template) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) has the wrong template', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
       aapr.component_template_options,
       aapr.report_template,
			 aapr.workspace
from apex_application_page_regions aapr

inner join apex_applications aa on aa.application_id = aap.application_id
                                and aa.theme_number = 1000
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option

EXPLANATION: Any region in the 'Welcome Banner'/'Banners' positions should have a template of 'Welcome Banner', 'Banner Message' or 'Panel'
FIX: Change the template or position

TEST_NAME: Regions in the "Page Header" position are correctly config
QUERY_CLOB:
select case when aapr.template in ('Blank with Attributes','No Template')
            then 'Y'
            when aap.page_template in ('Foldout (Vertical Header)','AO Foldout (Vertical Header)')
            then case when aapr.template not in ('Item Overview')
                      then 'N'
                      else 'Y'
                      end
            when aapr.template not in ('Page Header')
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,                          
       aapr.application_id, 
       aapr.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapr.last_updated_by,
       aapr.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) has the wrong template: `%3` (page template `%4`)', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
        p3 => aapr.template,
        p4 => aap.page_template) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) has the wrong template', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
       aapr.component_template_options,
       aapr.report_template,
       aap.page_template,
			 aapr.workspace
from apex_application_page_regions aapr
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id
where aapr.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aapr.display_position = 'Page Header'
EXPLANATION: A region in the `Page Header` display position should have a region template of `Page Header`, unless the page template is `Foldout (Vertical Header)` , in which case the region template should be `Item Overview`
FIX: Correct the display position or template

TEST_NAME: Breadcrumbs have a template and position of "Page Header"
QUERY_CLOB:
select case when aapr.display_position = 'Page Header'
            then 'Y'
            when aapr.template = 'Page Header'
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,                          
       aapr.application_id, 
       aapr.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapr.last_updated_by,
       aapr.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) should have both a template and position of "Page Header" (position `%3`, template `%4`)', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
				p3 => aapr.display_position,
				p4 => aapr.template) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) has the wrong template or position', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
       aa.theme_number,
			 aapr.workspace
from apex_application_page_regions aapr
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id
inner join apex_applications aa on aa.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id
where aapr.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and aa.theme_number  = 1000
and aapr.source_type = 'Breadcrumb'
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION: Regions with a Source type of `Breadcrumb` should be in the `Page Header` display position and with a template of `Page Header`
FIX: Correct the display position and/or template

TEST_NAME: Regions in "Table of Contents" are correctly configured
QUERY_CLOB:
select case when aapr.template not in ('Guided Process Region')
            then 'N'
            when aapr.source_type not in ('List')
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,

TEST_NAME: Contextual Info regions should be configured correctly
QUERY_CLOB:
select case when aapr.template not in ('No Template', 'Blank with Attributes')
            then 'N'
            when aapr.display_position != 'Contextual Info'
            then 'N'
            when aapr.report_template != 'Contextual Info (Row)'
            then 'N'
            when aap.page_template in ('AO Foldout (Horizontal Header)','Foldout (Horizontal Header)')
            then case when aapr.component_template_options not like '%js-ConveyorBelt%'
                      then 'N'
                      when aapr.component_template_options not like '%rw-ContextualInfo--horizontal%'
                      then 'N'
                      when aapr.component_template_options not like '%rw-ContextualInfo--labelInline%'
                      then 'N'
                      when aapr.component_template_options not like '%rw-Report--hideNoPagination%'
                      then 'N'
                      else 'Y'
                      end
            when aap.page_template in ('AO Foldout (Vertical Header)','Foldout (Vertical Header)','Item Overview','AO Item Overview','Item Overview')
            then case when aapr.component_template_options not like '%rw-ContextualInfo--vertical%'
                      then 'N'
                      when aapr.component_template_options not like '%rw-ContextualInfo--labelStacked%'
                      then 'N'
                      when aapr.component_template_options not like '%rw-Report--hideNoPagination%'
                      then 'N'
                      else 'Y'
                      end
            when aap.page_template in ('AO General Overview','General Overview','Generic')
            then case when aapr.component_template_options not like '%rw-Report--hideNoPagination%'
                      then 'N'
                      else 'Y'
                      end
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,                          
       aapr.application_id, 
       aapr.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapr.last_updated_by,
       aapr.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) is misconfigured (template `%3`, display position `%4`, template options `%5`, report template `%6`, page template `%7`', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
        p3 => aapr.template,
        p4 => aapr.display_position,
        p5 => aapr.component_template_options,
        p6 => aapr.report_template,
        p7 => aap.page_template) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) is misconfigured', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
       aapr.component_template_options,
       aapr.report_template,
       aa.theme_number,
       aap.page_template,
			 aapr.workspace
from apex_application_page_regions aapr
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id
inner join apex_applications aa on aa.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id
where aapr.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and aa.theme_number = 1000
and aapr.region_name = 'Contextual Info'
and aapr.source_type = 'Report'
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION:
The Contextual Info Classic Report should be:

1.  inside the `Contextual info`  display position
2.  with a template of `none`  or `Blank with Attributes` 
3.  with a report template of `Contextual Info (Row)`

### Page template considerations

### `Foldout (Horizontal Header)`

1.  Check `Conveyor Belt` 
2.  Set Layout to `Horizontal` 
3.  Set Label to `Inline`
4.  Set Pagination Display to `Hide when all rows displayed`

### `Foldout (Vertical Header)` / `Item Overview`

1.  Set Layout to `Vertical` 
2.  Set Label to `Stacked`
3.  Set Pagination Display to `Hide when all rows displayed`

### `General Overview` / `Generic`

1.  Set Pagination Display to `Hide when all rows displayed`
FIX: Correct the display position, template, report template or template options

TEST_NAME: Banner Message region should only have Links
QUERY_CLOB:
with std as (select application_id, page_id, region_id, count(*) btn_cnt
                from apex_application_page_buttons apb
                where apb.button_template != 'Link'
                group by application_id, page_id, region_id)
select case when std.btn_cnt is null
            then 'Y'
            when std.btn_cnt > 0
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       aapr.workspace,
       aapr.application_id, 
       aapr.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapr.last_updated_by,
       aapr.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2, template `%3`) should only have buttons of template `Link`', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) has misconfigured buttons', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
       aapr.component_template_options,
       aapr.report_template
from apex_application_page_regions aapr
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id
                                      and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id
left outer join std on  aapr.application_id = std.application_id
                    and aapr.page_id = std.page_id
                    and aapr.region_id = std.region_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id

       aapr.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) is in the wrong display position : `%3`', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
        p3 => aapr.display_position) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) is in the wrong display position', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
       aapr.component_template_options,
       aapr.report_template,
			 aapr.workspace
from apex_application_page_regions aapr
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id
where aapr.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aapr.source_type = 'Smart Filters'
EXPLANATION: Any regions of source type `Smart Filters` should be in the display position `Smart Filters & Search` or `Smart Filters`
FIX: Correct the display position

TEST_NAME: Page Items incorrectly prefixed
QUERY_CLOB:
select a50.pass_yn,
       a50.application_id,
			 null child_code,
       a50.page_id, 
       a50.page_name, 
       a50.component_id, 
			 null parent_component_id,
       a50.item_name, 
       a50.region,
       a50.created_by, 
       a50.created_on, 
       a50.last_updated_by, 
       a50.last_updated_on,
			 a50.workspace,
       case when a50.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format(p_message => 
            q'^%1, is incorrectly named (id: %0, region: %2)^',
            p0 => a50.component_id, 
            p1 => a50.item_name, 
            p2 => a50.region
            )
            end as validation_failure_message,
       case when a50.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format(p_message => 
            q'^%1 is incorrectly named (page %0 app %2)^',
            p0 => a50.page_id, 
            p1 => a50.item_name, 
            p2 => a50.application_id
            )
            end as issue_title
from (
     select 
     case when pi.item_name like 'P'||pi.page_id||'_%'
          then 'Y'
          else 'N'
          end as pass_yn,
     pi.application_id,
     pi.item_id component_id, 
     pi.item_name, 
     pi.page_id, 
     pi.page_name, 
     pi.region,
     app.created_by created_by, 
     app.created_on created_on, 
     coalesce(pi.last_updated_by, app.last_updated_by) last_updated_by, 
     coalesce(pi.last_updated_on, app.last_updated_on) last_updated_on,
	   pi.workspace
     from apex_application_page_items pi
     inner join apex_application_pages app on  app.page_id = pi.page_id
                                           and app.application_id = pi.application_id
     inner join v_apex_applications aa on pi.application_id = aa.application_id
                                     and aa.availability_status != 'Unavailable'
     where pi.page_id not like '%.%' --indicates a translated app 
) a50
EXPLANATION: Page Items should be prefixed "P" and the \`page id\`, e.g. "P1\_ITEM".
FIX: Correct the item name

       apex_string.format(

			 aap.build_option,

TEST_NAME: Buttons should be styled correctly
QUERY_CLOB:
with std as (select case when aapb.button_name = 'DELETE'
                         then case when aapb.button_template_options not like '%danger%'
                                   then 'DANGER-DELETE'
                                   end
                         when aapb.button_name = 'CREATE'
                         then case when aapb.display_position_code = 'NEXT' and aa.theme_number = 1000
                                   then 'NEXT-CREATE'
                                   end
                         when aapb.icon_css_classes like 'fa-%'
                         then case when aa.theme_number = 1000
                                   then 'WRONGLIBRARY'
                                   when aapb.icon_css_classes like '%anim%'
                                   then 'BUTTON-ANIM'
                                   end
                         end child_code,
                    aapb.workspace, 
                    aapb.application_id, 
                    aapb.page_id, 
                    aapb.button_name, 
                    aapb.button_template_options,
                    aapb.button_id component_id,
                    aapb.last_updated_by, 
                    aapb.last_updated_on,
                    aa.theme_number,
                    aapb.display_position_code,
                    aapb.icon_css_classes
            from apex_application_page_buttons aapb
            inner join apex_applications aa on aapb.application_id = aa.application_id
						where aapb.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE'))
select case when std.child_code is not null 
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,
       std.application_id,
       std.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       case when std.child_code is not null
            then apex_string.format(p_message => 'The `%0` button (app %1, page %2) %3.', 
                          p0 => std.button_name, 
                          p1 => std.application_id,
                          p2 => std.page_id,
                          p3 => case std.child_code 
                                     when 'DANGER-DELETE'
                                     then 'should be styled as "Danger". It currently has the following styling :`'||std.button_template_options||'`'
                                     when 'NEXT-CREATE'
                                     then 'should be placed in the `NEXT` position. It is currently in the following position: `'||std.display_position_code||'`'
                                     when 'BUTTON-ANIM'
                                     then 'has an animation. Please eliminate'
                                     when 'WRONGLIBRARY'
                                     then 'is using an invalid `Universal Theme` icon (`'||std.icon_css_classes||'`). You must use a `Redwood` icon'
                                     end) 
            end validation_failure_message,
       case when std.child_code is not null
            then apex_string.format(p_message => 'The `%0` button (app %1, page %2) is incorrectly styled', 
                          p0 => std.button_name, 
                          p1 => std.application_id,
                          p2 => std.page_id)  
            end issue_title,
	   std.child_code,
		 std.button_name, 
     std.button_template_options,
     std.component_id,
     std.display_position_code,
     null parent_component_id,
     std.theme_number,
     std.icon_css_classes,
		 std.workspace
from std
EXPLANATION:
Buttons should be styled and placed correctly according to their function : \* BUTTON-ANIM : Including icons is fine (even encouraged). Icon placement should always be on the left. Adding animated icons (assigning a fa-anim-... class to an icon) is strongly discouraged. It's not the early 90's and this is not a geocities website.

*   DANGER-DELETE : Delete buttons should always styled as "Danger", and far away from the primary action.
*   NEXT-CREATE : Cancel button should be left-most button in the NEXT button position.
*   WRONGLIBRARY : You cannot use \`Universal Theme\` icons (the ‘fa-’ icons) in \`Redwood\`.
FIX:
*   BUTTON-ANIM : Remove the animation
*   DANGER-DELETE : Add the Danger style to the button
*   NEXT-CREATE : Reposition the button
*   WRONGLIBRARY : Use a Redwood icon

TEST_NAME: Reports should have a reset button
QUERY_CLOB:
with std as (select case when pir.show_search_bar = 'No'
                         then 'Y'
                         when apr.buttons = 0 
                         then 'N' 
                         else case when apb.display_position = 'RIGHT_OF_IR_SEARCH_BAR'
                                then 'Y'
                                else 'N'
                                end
                         end pass_yn,
                apr.application_id,
                apr.page_id,
                null created_by,
                null created_on,
                apr.last_updated_by,
                apr.last_updated_on,
                apr.region_name, 
                apr.buttons, 
                apb.button_name, 
                apb.label, 
                apb.display_position,
                apr.region_id component_id,
                apb.button_sequence,
                pir.show_search_bar,
						    apr.workspace
            from apex_application_page_regions apr
            inner join apex_application_page_ir pir on apr.application_id = pir.application_id
                                                    and apr.page_id = pir.page_id
                                                    and apr.region_id = pir.region_id 
            left outer join apex_application_page_buttons apb on apr.application_id = apb.application_id
                                                              and apr.page_id = apb.page_id
                                                              and apr.region_id = apb.region_id
                                                              and apb.label = 'Reset'
						where apr.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE'))
select std.pass_yn,
       std.application_id,
       std.page_id,
       std.created_by,
       std.created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       case when std.pass_yn = 'N' 
            then apex_string.format('Report `%0` (page %1, app %2) is missing a Reset button in the correct location %3',
                                    p0 => std.region_name,
                                    p1 => std.page_id,
                                    p2 => std.application_id,
                                    p3 => case when std.display_position is not null
                                               then '( It is in the : `'||std.display_position||'` position but should be `Right of Interactive Report Search Bar` position in the left-most position)'
                                               end)
            end validation_failure_message,
       case when std.pass_yn = 'N' 
            then apex_string.format('Report `%0` (page %1, app %2) is missing a Reset button',
                                    p0 => std.region_name,
                                    p1 => std.page_id,
                                    p2 => std.application_id)
            end issue_title,
       show_search_bar,
			 std.component_id,
			 null parent_component_id,
			 std.workspace
from std
EXPLANATION: Always display a reset button in the "Right of Interactive Report Toolbar" position. This reset button should be the left-most button in this position (any other buttons in this position should be to the left of the reset button).
FIX: Create a reset button or correct the existing one by moving it's display position

TEST_NAME: Use Floating Labels
QUERY_CLOB:
select 'N' pass_yn,
       api.application_id, 
       api.page_id, 
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       api.last_updated_by,
       api.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Page Item `%0` (page %1, app %2) has a template of `%3` but should have a Floating Label. Use Floating Label templates for Modal Dialogs',
                          p0 => api.item_name,
                          p1 => api.page_id,
                          p2 => api.application_id,
                          p3 => api.item_label_template
                         ) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Page Item `%0` (page %1, app %2) should have Floating Label template',
                          p0 => api.item_name,
                          p1 => api.page_id,
                          p2 => api.application_id
                         ) issue_title,
       api.item_name, 
       api.display_as,
       api.item_label_template, 
       api.item_label_template_id, 
       api.item_id component_id,
			 null parent_component_id,
			 api.workspace
from apex_application_page_items api 
inner join apex_applications aa on api.application_id = aa.application_id
                                and aa.theme_number = 42
inner join apex_application_pages aap on  api.application_id = aap.application_id 
                                      and api.page_id = aap.page_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = api.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = api.application_id
where api.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and api.item_label_template not like '%Floating'
and api.display_as not in ('Hidden')
and api.item_label_template not in ('Hidden')
EXPLANATION: We want a consistent, modern look
FIX: Use one of the 'Floating' templates (under Appearance)

TEST_NAME: Classic Report should be correctly styled
QUERY_CLOB:
with filt_regns as (select workspace, application_id, page_id, filtered_region_id
                    from apex_application_page_regions
                    where source_type = 'Faceted Search'),
     std as (select case when fr.filtered_region_id is not null 
                         then case when apr.template != 'Cards Container'
                                   then 'CARD_WRONG_TEMPLATE'
                                   end
                         when apr.template != 'Standard'
                         then 'C_WRONG_TEMPLATE'
                         else case when apr.parent_region_id is null 
                                   then case when apr.region_template_options not like '%noPadding%'
                                             then 'C_REMOVE_PADDING'
                                             when apr.region_template_options not like '%noBorder%'
                                             then 'C_NO_BORDER'
                                             end
                                   when apr.region_template_options not like '%noUI%'
                                   then 'C_REMOVE_UI_DEC'
                                   end
                         end child_code,
                    apr.region_name, 
                    apr.template, 
                    apr.region_template_options, 
                    apr.component_template_options, 
                    apr.parent_region_id parent_component_id,
                    apr.application_id,
                    apr.page_id,
                    apr.last_updated_by,
                    apr.last_updated_on,
                    apr.region_id component_id,
                    apr.workspace
            from apex_application_page_regions apr
            inner join apex_applications aa on apr.application_id = aa.application_id
                                            and aa.theme_number = 42
            left outer join filt_regns fr on  apr.application_id = fr.application_id
                                          and apr.page_id = fr.page_id
                                          and apr.region_id = fr.filtered_region_id
            where apr.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
            and apr.source_type  = 'Report')
select case when std.child_code is not null
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,
       std.application_id,
       std.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Classic Report `%0` (page %1, app %2) is incorrectly styled. %3',
                p0 => std.region_name,
                p1 => std.page_id,
                p2 => std.application_id,
                p3 => 
                case when std.child_code  = 'C_WRONG_TEMPLATE'
                     then 'The template should be `Standard` '||' but is currently `'||std.template||'`'
                     when std.child_code  = 'C_REMOVE_PADDING'
                     then 'The padding should be removed'
                     when std.child_code  = 'C_NO_BORDER'
                     then 'The border should be removed'
                     when std.child_code  = 'C_REMOVE_UI_DEC'
                     then 'The style should be `Remove UI Decoration` because it is a sub region'
                     end
                ) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Classic Report `%0` (page %1, app %2) is incorrectly styled',
            p0 => std.region_name,
            p1 => std.page_id,
            p2 => std.application_id) issue_title,
       std.child_code,
       std.component_id,
       std.template, 
       std.region_template_options, 
       std.component_template_options, 
       std.parent_component_id,
      std.workspace
from std
EXPLANATION:
\[Region level template options to No Region Padding, the Report template options to "No Outer Borders". Ensure a sub region's style is "Remove UI Decoration".\]

*   C\_NO\_BORDER : Classic reports should be styled to have no borders
*   C\_REMOVE\_PADDING : Classic reports should be styled to have no padding
*   C\_REMOVE\_UI\_DEC : Classic reports that are sub-regions should be styled not have any UI Decoration
*   C\_WRONG\_TEMPLATE : Classic Reports should have a 'Standard' template
*   CARD\_WRONG\_TEMPLATE : Filtered regions should have a 'Cards Containter' template
FIX:
*   C\_NO\_BORDER : Remove the borders
*   C\_REMOVE\_PADDING : Correct style
*   C\_REMOVE\_UI\_DEC : Remove UI Decoration
*   C\_WRONG\_TEMPLATE : Correct the template

TEST_NAME: Pages should limit the amount of Dynamic Actions
QUERY_CLOB:
with tmd as (select workspace, application_id, page_id, count(*) da_count
             from apex_application_page_da
						 where workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
             having count(*) > 20
             group by workspace, application_id, page_id)
select 'N'  pass_yn,
       tmd.application_id,
       tmd.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aap.last_updated_by,
       aap.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Page %0 (app %1) has %2 dynamic actions. It is not recommended to have more than 10.',
                          tmd.application_id,
                          tmd.page_id,
                          tmd.da_count) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Page %0 (app %1) has too many Dynamic Actions',
                          tmd.application_id,
                          tmd.page_id) issue_title,
       tmd.da_count,
			 aap.build_option,
       abo.build_option_status,
       abo.status_on_export,
			 tmd.page_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
			 tmd.workspace
from tmd
inner join apex_application_pages aap on  tmd.application_id = aap.application_id
                                      and tmd.page_id = aap.page_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options abo on abo.application_id = aap.application_id 
                                                   and abo.build_option_name = aap.build_option
where coalesce(abo.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION: Pages should limit the number of Dynamic Actions per page to 10. Never more than 20. : Try to limit the number of Dynamic Actions per page to 10. Never more than 20.
FIX: Cut down on the number of Dynamic Actions

TEST_NAME: Form Elements should have help text
QUERY_CLOB:
with pproc as (select application_id, page_id, count(1) proc_count
                from apex_application_page_proc
                group by application_id, page_id),
     api as (select case when lower(api.label) in ('username','password')
                         then 'Y'
						             when api.item_help_text is null 
                         then case when api.display_as = 'Checkbox' 
                                   and api.item_label_template in ('Label Top')
                                   then 'Y'
                                   else 'N'
                                   end
                         else 'Y'
                         end pass_yn,
                    api.application_id,
                    api.page_id,
                    api.last_updated_by,
                    api.last_updated_on,
                    api.item_id component_id,
                    api.item_name,
                    api.item_source_type,
                    api.item_help_text,
                    api.display_as,
                    aap.build_option,
                    abo.build_option_status,
                    abo.status_on_export,
                    api.item_label_template,
                    api.label,
                    api.workspace,
                    pproc.proc_count
            from apex_application_page_items api
            inner join apex_application_pages aap on  api.application_id = aap.application_id
                                                  and api.page_id = aap.page_id
            inner join pproc on  pproc.application_id = api.application_id
                             and pproc.page_id = api.page_id
            left outer join apex_application_build_options abo on  aap.application_id = abo.application_id
                                                               and aap.build_option = abo.build_option_name 
            left outer join apex_application_build_options abo2 on  api.application_id = abo2.application_id
                                                                and api.build_option = abo2.build_option_name 
            where api.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
            and api.display_as not in ('Hidden')
            and coalesce(abo.status_on_export,'NA') not in ('Exclude')
            and coalesce(abo2.status_on_export,'NA') not in ('Exclude')
            )
select api.pass_yn,
       api.application_id,
       api.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       api.last_updated_by,
       api.last_updated_on,
       case when api.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format('Item `%0` (page %1, app %2, displayed as `%3`) is missing Help Text. Form items require Help Text.',
                          p0 => api.item_name,
                          p1 => api.page_id,
                          p2 => api.application_id,
                          p3 => api.display_as) 
            end validation_failure_message,
       case when api.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format('Item `%0` (page %1, app %2) is missing Help Text',
                          p0 => api.item_name,
                          p1 => api.page_id,
                          p2 => api.application_id) 
            end issue_title,
       api.component_id,
       api.item_name,
       api.display_as,
       null parent_component_id,
       api.item_help_text,

TEST_NAME: Button size should be default
QUERY_CLOB:
with std as (select apb.application_id, 
                    apb.page_id, 
                    apb.button_id component_id, 
                    apb.button_name, 
                    bto.column_value template_option,
                    null created_by,
                    null created_on,
                    apb.last_updated_by,
                    apb.last_updated_on,
                    aap.build_option,
                    abo.build_option_status,
						 				abo.status_on_export,
						        apb.workspace
            from apex_application_page_buttons apb
            inner join table(apex_string.split(apb.button_template_options, ':')) bto 
                        on bto.column_value in ('rw-Button--sm', 'rw-Button--md', 'rw-Button--lg', 't-Button--tiny', 't-Button--small', 't-Button--large')
            inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.application_id = apb.application_id
                                                  and aap.page_id = apb.page_id
            left outer join apex_application_build_options abo on  abo.application_id = apb.application_id
                                                               and aap.build_option = abo.build_option_name
            where apb.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
						and coalesce(abo.status_on_export, 'NA') not in ('Exclude')
            )
select 'N'  pass_yn,
       std.application_id,
       std.page_id,
       std.created_by,
       std.created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Button `%0` (app %1, page %2) should have a default size but currently has a size of `%3`', 
                          p0 => std.button_name,
                          p1 => std.application_id,
                          p2 => std.page_id,
                          p3 => std.template_option) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Button `%0` (app %1, page %2) should have a default size', 
                          p0 => std.button_name,
                          p1 => std.application_id,
                          p2 => std.page_id) issue_title,
       std.component_id,
       std.button_name,
       std.template_option,
			 null parent_component_id,
			 std.workspace
from std

TEST_NAME: Classic Columns are correctly aligned
QUERY_CLOB:
with std as (select case when prc.heading_alignment != prc.column_alignment
                         then 'MISALIGN_C'
                         end child_code,
            prc.application_id, 
            prc.page_id, 
            prc.column_alias, 
            prc.heading, 
            prc.heading_alignment,
            prc.column_alignment,
            prc.display_as,
            null column_type,
            prc.region_id,
            prc.region_name,
            prc.region_report_column_id component_id,
            prc.last_updated_by,
            prc.last_updated_on,
            null created_on,
            null created_by,
						workspace
            from apex_application_page_rpt_cols prc
        )
select case when std.child_code is null 
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn, 
       std.application_id,
       std.page_id,
       std.created_by,
       std.created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Column `%0` in `%1` (page %2, app %3) %4', 
                            p0 => std.heading, 
                            p1 => std.region_name, 
                            p2 => std.page_id, 
                            p3 => std.application_id,
                            p4 => case when std.child_code  = 'LEFT_ALIGN_C'
                                       then 'should be aligned to the left'
                                       when std.child_code  = 'RIGHT_ALIGN_C'
                                       then 'should be aligned to the right'
                                       when std.child_code  = 'MISALIGN_C'
                                       then 'is misaligned with the heading'
                                       end
                            ) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Column `%0` in `%1` (page %2, app %3) is incorrectly aligned', 
                            p0 => std.heading, 
                            p1 => std.region_name, 
                            p2 => std.page_id, 
                            p3 => std.application_id) issue_title,
       std.child_code,
       std.region_id,
       std.component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
			 std.workspace
from std
inner join apex_application_page_regions apr on std.application_id = apr.application_id 
                                             and std.page_id = apr.page_id
                                             and std.region_id = apr.region_id
                                             and coalesce(apr.report_template,'NA') != 'List Item'
where std.heading is not null
and std.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
EXPLANATION:
Classic Report Columns should be aligned according to their data type : \* LEFT\_ALIGN\_C : Dates, names, identifier columns should be left aligned

*   MISALIGN\_C : The Column and Column Heading have different alignment
*   RIGHT\_ALIGN\_C : Number columns should be right aligned
FIX:
*   The Column and Heading should be aligned the same way:
    *   Left Align: All columns by default (dates, names, identifiers, etc)
    *   Center Align: Buttons / Actions / Icons / Badges
    *   Right Align: Number columns that represent size (e.g. budget / counts / etc)
    *   RIGHT\_ALIGN\_C : \* Right Align: Number columns that represent size (e.g. budget / counts / etc)

TEST_NAME: Apps should have a centralized css file
QUERY_CLOB:
with aac as (select workspace, application_id, count(1) page_count
                from apex_application_pages
                where workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
						    and inline_css is not null
                group by workspace, application_id),
    acss as (select application_id, count(1) file_count
                from apex_application_static_files
                where file_name like '%css'
                group by application_id),
     std as (
        select aac.application_id,
               null page_id,
               aa.created_by,
               aa.created_on,
               aa.last_updated_by,
               aa.last_updated_on,
               aa.css_file_urls,
               aac.page_count,
               acss.file_count,
			         aac.workspace,
               case when aac.page_count = 0
                    then 'Y' 
                    else case when coalesce(acss.file_count,0) = 0
                              then 'MISSING_CSS_FILE'
                              else case when aa.css_file_urls is null 
                                        then 'MISSING_CSS_REFERENCE'
                                        end
                              end 
                    end child_code
        from aac 
        inner join apex_applications aa on aac.application_id = aa.application_id
        left outer join acss on acss.application_id = aac.application_id
     )
select case when std.child_code is not null
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,
       std.application_id,
       std.page_id,
       std.created_by,
       std.created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       case when std.child_code is not null
            then apex_string.format('App %0 %1',
                    p0 => std.application_id,
                    p1 => case when std.child_code = 'MISSING_CSS_FILE'
                               then 'is missing a CSS file in Static Application Files (suggestion: `css/main.css`)'
                               when std.child_code = 'MISSING_CSS_REFERENCE'
                               then 'does not reference a centralized css file in Application Definition > User Interfaces > CSS File URLs'
                               end
                ) 
            end validation_failure_message,
       case when std.child_code is not null
            then apex_string.format('App %0 %1',
                    p0 => std.application_id,
                    p1 => case when std.child_code = 'MISSING_CSS_FILE'
                               then 'is missing a centralized CSS file'
                               when std.child_code = 'MISSING_CSS_REFERENCE'
                               then 'does not reference a centralized css file'
                               end
                ) 
            end  issue_title,
	   std.child_code,
     std.css_file_urls,
     std.page_count,
     std.file_count,
		 std.application_id component_id,
     null parent_component_id,
		 std.workspace
from std
EXPLANATION: Apps with page-level inline css should have a css file in static files
