       std.created_by,
       std.created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Column `%0` in `%1` (page %2, app %3) %4', 
                            p0 => std.heading, 
                            p1 => std.region_name, 
                            p2 => std.page_id, 
                            p3 => std.application_id,
                            p4 => case when std.child_code  = 'LEFT_ALIGN_IG'
                                       then 'should be aligned to the left'
                                       when std.child_code  = 'RIGHT_ALIGN_IG'
                                       then 'should be aligned to the right'
                                       when std.child_code  = 'MISALIGN_IG'
                                       then 'is misaligned with the heading'
                                       end
                            ) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Column `%0` in `%1` (page %2, app %3) is incorrectly aligned', 
                            p0 => std.heading, 
                            p1 => std.region_name, 
                            p2 => std.page_id, 
                            p3 => std.application_id) issue_title,
       std.child_code,
       std.region_id,
       std.component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
			 std.workspace
from std
inner join apex_application_page_regions apr on std.application_id = apr.application_id 
                                             and std.page_id = apr.page_id
                                             and std.region_id = apr.region_id
                                             and coalesce(apr.report_template,'NA') != 'List Item'
where std.heading is not null
EXPLANATION:
Interactive Grid Columns should be aligned according to their data type : \* LEFT\_ALIGN\_IG : Dates, names, identifier columns should be left aligned

*   MISALIGN\_IG : The Column and Column Heading have different alignment
*   RIGHT\_ALIGN\_IG : Number columns should be right aligned
FIX:
*   The Column and Heading should be aligned the same way:
    *   Left Align: All columns by default (dates, names, identifiers, etc)
    *   Center Align: Buttons / Actions / Icons / Badges
    *   Right Align: Number columns that represent size (e.g. budget / counts / etc)
    *   RIGHT\_ALIGN\_IG : \* Right Align: Number columns that represent size (e.g. budget / counts / etc)

TEST_NAME: Pages should not remove padding
QUERY_CLOB:
select 'N' pass_yn,                          
       aap.application_id, 
       aap.page_id,
       aap.created_by,
       aap.created_on,
       aap.last_updated_by,
       aap.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Page %0 (app %1) is missing padding. Padding should not be removed at the page level',
              p0 => aap.page_id,
              p1 => aap.application_id
       ) validation_failure_message,      
       apex_string.format('Page %0 (app %1) is missing padding.',
              p0 => aap.page_id,
              p1 => aap.application_id
       ) issue_title,                  
       aap.page_id component_id,             
       null parent_component_id,
			 aap.workspace
from apex_application_pages aap
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aap.application_id
where aap.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and (page_template_options like '%noContentPadding%' or page_template_options like '%noMainPadding%')

TEST_NAME: Filtered Regions has Card Container template
QUERY_CLOB:
with filt_regns as (select workspace, application_id, page_id, filtered_region_id
                    from apex_application_page_regions
                    where source_type = 'Faceted Search')
select case when aapr.template = 'Cards Container'
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       aapr.workspace,
       aapr.application_id, 
       aapr.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapr.last_updated_by,
       aapr.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) has the wrong template : `%3`', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
        p3 => aapr.template) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) has the wrong template', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
       aapr.component_template_options,
       aapr.report_template
from apex_application_page_regions aapr
inner join filt_regns fr on  aapr.application_id = fr.application_id
                         and aapr.page_id = fr.page_id
                         and aapr.region_id = fr.filtered_region_id
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id
                                      and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id
inner join apex_applications aa on aa.application_id = aapr.application_id
                                and aa.theme_number = 42
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id
where aapr.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'

TEST_NAME: Column image links should have alt text
QUERY_CLOB:
select a10.pass_yn,
       a10.application_id,
       a10.page_id,
       a10.region_name,
       a10.column_alias,
       a10.report_label,
       a10.column_linktext,
       a10.column_link_attr,
       a10.created_by, 
       a10.created_on, 
       a10.updated_by last_updated_by, 
       a10.updated_on last_updated_on,
       case when a10.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format(
                    p_message => q'^Link Column %1, in report %0, is missing an aria-label. 
                    • Report Label/Heading : %2
                    • Link text : %3
                    • Link attributes : %4.
                    • Suggestion : 
                         - remove `alt=""` from the Link Text
                         - add `aria-label="edit #YOUR_COLUMN#"` to the Link Attributes
                    ^',
                    p0 => a10.region_name,
                    p1 => a10.column_alias,
                    p2 => a10.report_label,
                    p3 => a10.column_linktext,
                    p4 => a10.column_link_attr
                    )
            end as validation_failure_message,
       case when a10.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format(p_message => q'^Column %1 (page %0, app %2) is missing an aria-label attribute^',
                                    p0 => a10.page_id,
                                    p1 => a10.column_alias,
                                    p2 => a10.application_id
                                    )
            end as issue_title,
      a10.component_id,
      a10.parent_component_id,
			a10.workspace
from (
     select 
     case when ic1.column_linktext is null
          then 'Y'
          when ic1.column_linktext like '%.png%'
          then case when ic1.column_linktext like '%alt=""%'
                    then 'N'
                    when ic1.column_linktext not like '%aria-label%'
                    then case when ic1.column_link_attr is null 
                            then 'N'
                            when ic1.column_link_attr not like '%aria-label%'
                            then 'N'
                            else 'Y'
                            end
                    else 'Y'
                    end
          else 'Y'
          end pass_yn,
     ic1.application_id,
     ic1.page_id,
     ic1.region_name,
     ic1.column_alias,
     ic1.report_label,
     ic1.column_linktext,
     ic1.column_link_attr,
     ic1.column_id component_id,
     null parent_component_id,
     coalesce(ic1.created_by, app.created_by) created_by, 
     coalesce(ic1.created_on, app.created_on) created_on, 
     coalesce(ic1.updated_by, app.last_updated_by) updated_by, 
     coalesce(ic1.updated_on, app.last_updated_on) updated_on,
	   ic1.workspace
     from apex_application_page_ir_col ic1
     inner join apex_application_pages app on  app.page_id = ic1.page_id
                                           and app.application_id = ic1.application_id
     inner join  v_apex_applications aa on ic1.application_id = aa.application_id
                                        and aa.availability_status != 'Unavailable'
                                        and ic1.column_linktext is not null
	   where ic1.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
) a10
EXPLANATION: Column image links should have accessible alt text : Link columns in reports that do not feature text (eg, they have the pencil symbol) should include “Alt” text. This alt-text will be displayed by a screen-reader in the web-elements rotor, “links” section.
FIX: Add some descriptive text to your alt text. You are encouraged to use substitution variables. For eg: ``

TEST_NAME: Region should have Row Header
QUERY_CLOB:
with apx_rl as (
       select case when substr(version_no,1, 2) >= 21
              then 'Y'
              else 'N'
              end compatible_apx_version
       from apex_release
       ),
rpt_cols as (
       select pic.application_id, 
              pic.page_id, 
              pic.region_name, 
              pic.use_as_row_header,
              pic.region_id, 
              'IR' report_type,
              pic.created_by,
              pic.created_on,
              pic.updated_by,
              pic.updated_on,
              pic.column_id,
              pic.workspace
       from v_apex_application_page_ir_col pic
       union all
       select pig.application_id, 
              pig.page_id, 
              pig.region_name, 
              pig.use_as_row_header,
              pig.region_id, 
              'IG' report_type,
              null created_by,
              null created_on,
              pig.last_updated_by,
              pig.last_updated_on,
              pig.column_id,
              pig.workspace
       from apex_appl_page_ig_columns pig 
       union all
       select prc.application_id, 
              prc.page_id, 
              prc.region_name, 
              prc.use_as_row_header,
              prc.region_id, 
              'C' report_type,
              null created_by,
              null created_on,
              prc.last_updated_by,
              prc.last_updated_on,
              prc.region_report_column_id,
              prc.workspace
       from apex_application_page_rpt_cols prc 
       where column_is_hidden = 'No'
),
rpt_cols_fm as (
       select rc.application_id, 
              rc.page_id, 
              rc.region_name, 
              rc.use_as_row_header,
              rc.region_id, 
              rc.report_type,
              apex_string.format(
              p_message => q'^`%0` is missing a row header (App : %1, Page : %2, Region id : %3). Regions that support row headers should have a column with the "Use as Row Header" attribute set to Yes for accessibility reasons.^',
              p0 => rc.region_name,
              p1 => rc.application_id,
              p2 => rc.page_id,
              p3 => rc.region_id
              ) validation_failure_message,
              apex_string.format(
              p_message => '`%0` (app %1, page %2) is missing a row header',
              p0 => rc.region_name,
              p1 => rc.application_id,
              p2 => rc.page_id

              ) issue_title,
              app.created_by,
              app.created_on,
              coalesce(pr.last_updated_by, app.last_updated_by) last_updated_by, 
              coalesce(pr.last_updated_on, app.last_updated_on) last_updated_on,
              rc.column_id,
              rc.workspace
       from rpt_cols rc 
       inner join apex_application_page_regions pr on  pr.region_id = rc.region_id
                                                   and pr.page_id = rc.page_id 
                                                   and pr.application_id = rc.application_id
																									 and coalesce(pr.condition_type_code,'NA') != 'NEVER'
       inner join apex_application_pages app on  app.page_id        = rc.page_id
                                             and app.application_id = rc.application_id
       inner join  apex_applications aa on  rc.application_id     = aa.application_id
                                          and aa.availability_status != 'Unavailable'
)
select case when ar.compatible_apx_version = 'Y'
            then case when count(case when rcf.use_as_row_header = 'Yes'
                                      then 'x'
                                      when rcf.use_as_row_header = 'Y'
                                      then 'x'
                                      end) > 0
                      then 'Y'
                      else  'N'
                      end 
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,
       rcf.application_id, 
       rcf.page_id, 
       rcf.region_name, 
       rcf.region_id,
       rcf.report_type,
       rcf.created_by,
       rcf.created_on,
       rcf.last_updated_by, 
       rcf.last_updated_on,
       rcf.validation_failure_message,
       rcf.issue_title,
       apr.report_template,
       rcf.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       rcf.workspace
from rpt_cols_fm rcf
inner join apex_application_page_regions apr on rcf.region_id = apr.region_id
                                             and coalesce(apr.report_template ,'NA') not in ('List Item')
                                             and apr.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
cross join apx_rl ar 
group by rcf.application_id, 
         rcf.page_id, 
         rcf.region_name, 
         rcf.region_id,
         rcf.report_type,
         rcf.created_by,
         rcf.created_on,
         rcf.last_updated_by, 
         rcf.last_updated_on,
         rcf.validation_failure_message,
         rcf.issue_title,
         ar.compatible_apx_version,
         apr.report_template,
         rcf.workspace
EXPLANATION: One or more columns must have "Value Identifies Row" switched on so that screen readers can better describe individual records of a table.
FIX: At the column level of your report, toggle on “Value Identifies Row” for as many columns is appropriate to uniquely describe the record in human-friendly terms.

TEST_NAME: IG should avoid custom shortcuts
QUERY_CLOB:
with aapi as (select case
                     when lower(trim(javascript_code)) like '%shortcut%' then 'N' 
                     else 'Y'
                   end pass_yn,
                   javascript_code,
                   application_id,
                   page_id,
                   last_updated_by,
                   last_updated_on,
                   workspace,
                   region_name,
                   interactive_grid_id
            from apex_appl_page_igs)
select aapi.pass_yn,
       aapi.workspace,
       aapi.application_id, 
       aapi.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapi.last_updated_by,
       aapi.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Grid `%0` (app %1, page %2) is defining a custom shortcut: `%3%`', 
        p0 => aapi.region_name, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id,
        p3 => aapi.javascript_code) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Grid `%0` (app %1, page %2) has a custom shortcut', 
        p0 => aapi.region_name, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id) issue_title,
       aapi.interactive_grid_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapi.region_name,
       aapi.javascript_code
from aapi
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapi.page_id
                                      and aap.application_id = aapi.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
where aapi.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION:
WCAG 2.1 - 2.1.4 Character Key Shortcuts

Checking if shortcut keys have been created check IG javascript initialization code for references to keyboard shortcuts.

You don't want to interfere with the shortcuts for screen readers

https://www.w3.org/WAI/WCAG21/Understanding/character-key-shortcuts.html

TEST_NAME: Application Tabs should avoid tabindex
QUERY_CLOB:
with aat as (select case
                     when (lower(trim(tab_image_attributes)) like '%tabindex%' ) 
                     then 'N' 
                     else 'Y'
                     end pass_yn,
                     application_id,
                     tab_image_attributes,
                     last_updated_by,
                     last_updated_on,
                     workspace,
                     build_option,
                     tab_name,
                     tab_id
             from apex_application_tabs)
select aat.pass_yn,
       aat.workspace,
       aat.application_id, 
       null page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aat.last_updated_by,
       aat.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Tab `%0` (app %1) has a tabindex set :`%2`', 
        p0 => aat.tab_name, 
        p1 => aat.application_id,
        p2 => aat.tab_image_attributes) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Tab `%0` (app %1) has a tabindex set', 
        p0 => aat.tab_name, 
        p1 => aat.application_id) issue_title,
       aat.tab_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aat.tab_name,
       aat.tab_image_attributes
from aat
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = aat.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aat.application_id
where aat.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION:
WCAG 2.0/2.1 - 2.4.3 Focus Order

Checking application where tabindex has been added to an attribute that have negative impact on tab/focus order

TEST_NAME: Regions with HTML images should have alt text
QUERY_CLOB:
with std as (select case
                     when (coalesce((length(lower(region_source)) - length(replace(lower(region_source),'<img',null)))/4, length(lower(region_source)), 0) > 
                                coalesce((length(lower(region_source)) - length(replace(lower(region_source),'alt="',null)))/5, length(lower(region_source)), 0)) or
                                lower(replace(region_source,' ','')) like '%alt=""%' or
                                lower(region_source) like '% alt %'
                     then 'N'  
                     else 'Y'
                     end pass_yn,
                     to_char(substr(region_source,1,32737)) src,
                     application_id,page_id,region_id, workspace
            from apex_application_page_regions
            where lower(region_source) like '%<img%'
            union
            select case
                   when (coalesce((length(lower(region_header_text)) - length(replace(lower(region_header_text),'<img',null)))/4, length(lower(region_header_text)), 0) > 
                                coalesce((length(lower(region_header_text)) - length(replace(lower(region_header_text),'alt="',null)))/5, length(lower(region_header_text)), 0)) or
                                lower(replace(region_header_text,' ','')) like '%alt=""%' or
                                lower(region_header_text) like '% alt %'
                   then 'N'
                   else 'Y'
                   end pass_yn,
                   region_header_text,
                   application_id,page_id,region_id, workspace
            from apex_application_page_regions
            where lower(REGION_HEADER_TEXT) like '%<img%'
            union
            select case
                   when (coalesce((length(lower(region_footer_text)) - length(replace(lower(region_footer_text),'<img',null)))/4, length(lower(region_footer_text)), 0) > 
                               coalesce((length(lower(region_footer_text)) - length(replace(lower(region_footer_text),'alt="',null)))/5, length(lower(region_footer_text)), 0)) or
                               lower(replace(region_footer_text,' ','')) like '%alt=""%' or
                               lower(region_footer_text) like '% alt %'
                   then 'N'
                   else 'Y'
                   end pass_yn,
                   region_footer_text,
                   application_id,page_id,region_id, workspace
            from apex_application_page_regions
            where lower(REGION_FOOTER_TEXT) like '%<img%'
)
select std.pass_yn,                          
       aapr.application_id, 
       aapr.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapr.last_updated_by,
       aapr.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) has an image with no alt text (`%3`)', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
        p3 => substr(std.src,1,50)) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) has an image with no alt text', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
       std.src,
			 std.workspace
from std
inner join apex_application_page_regions aapr on std.region_id = aapr.region_id
                                              and std.application_id = aapr.application_id
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id
where std.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION:
WCAG 2.0/2.1 - 1.1.1  
searching images and if they have alt text set in html
FIX: Add alt text to your image

TEST_NAME: List templates should avoid inline CSS w blinking or animation

        p0 => aatl.template_name, 
        p1 => aatl.application_id,

Checking pages for inline CSS for blinking or animation logic

TEST_NAME: Inline with field error notification is insufficient
QUERY_CLOB:
with aapv as (
        select case  when error_display_location = 'INLINE_WITH_FIELD' 
                     then 'N' 
                     else 'Y'
                     end pass_yn,
                application_id,
                page_id, 
                validation_name,
                workspace,
                last_updated_by,
                last_updated_on,
                build_option,
                validation_id,
                error_display_location
           from apex_application_page_val
    )
select aapv.pass_yn,
       aapv.workspace,
       aapv.application_id, 
       aapv.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapv.last_updated_by,
       aapv.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Page Validation `%0` (app %1, page %2) error display settings are misconfigured: `%3`', 
        p0 => aapv.validation_name, 
        p1 => aapv.application_id,
        p2 => aapv.page_id,

TEST_NAME: IG Columns may need autocomplete
QUERY_CLOB:
with aapic as (
    select case
             when (lower(trim(b.item_attributes)) not like '%autocomplete%'
                   or trim(b.item_attributes) is null) 
             then 'N' 
             else 'Y'
             end pass_yn,
           b.application_id,
           b.page_id, 
           b.region_id,
           b.region_name, 
           b.source_expression,
           b.item_attributes,
           b.workspace,
           b.build_option,
           b.last_updated_by,
           b.last_updated_on,
           b.name,
           b.item_type,
           b.label,
           b.heading,
           b.parent_column_id,
           b.column_id
    from apex_appl_page_igs a,
         apex_appl_page_ig_columns b
    where a.application_id = b.application_id
      and b.region_id = a.region_id
      and a.is_editable = 'Yes'
      and b.is_query_only = 'No'
      and lower(b.heading) not like '%api%'
      and (
            (lower(b.heading) like '%name%' and (lower(b.heading) like '%first%' or lower(b.heading) like '%last%' or lower(b.heading) like '%family%'))
            or 
            (lower(b.heading) like '%address%')
            or 
            (lower(b.heading) like '%phone number%')
            or 
            (lower(b.heading) like '%mail%')
            or 
            (lower(b.heading) like '%birthday%' or lower(b.heading) like '%bday%')
         )
  )
select aapic.pass_yn,
       aapic.workspace,
       aapic.application_id, 
       aapic.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapic.last_updated_by,
       aapic.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Grid Column `%0` (app %1, page %2) may benefit from autocomplete', 
        p0 => aapic.heading, 
        p1 => aapic.application_id,
        p2 => aapic.page_id) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Grid Column `%0` (app %1, page %2) may benefit from autocomplete', 
        p0 => aapic.heading, 
        p1 => aapic.application_id,
        p2 => aapic.page_id) issue_title,
       aapic.column_id component_id,
       aapic.parent_column_id parent_component_id,
       aapic.heading,
       aapic.label,
       aapic.item_type,
       aapic.name
from aapic
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapic.page_id
                                      and aap.application_id = aapic.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = aapic.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapic.application_id
where aapic.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION:
WCAG 2.1 - 1.3.5 Identify Input Purpose.

Checking that inputs fields have autocomplete where appropriate  
https://www.w3.org/WAI/WCAG21/Understanding/identify-input-purpose.html

https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG21/#input-purposes

       aapi.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Grid Column alias for `%3` (app %1, page %2) is not unique. Column headings must be unique for accessibility.', 
        p0 => aapi.heading, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id,
        p3 => source_expression) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Grid Column alias for `%3` (app %1, page %2) is not unique', 
        p0 => aapi.heading, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id,
        p3 => source_expression) issue_title,
       aapi.column_id component_id,
       aapi.parent_column_id parent_component_id,
       aapi.heading,
       aapi.label,
       aapi.item_type,
       aapi.name,
       aapi.source_expression,
			 aapi.workspace
from aapi
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapi.page_id and aap.application_id = aapi.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id

where aapi.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'

TEST_NAME: DAs should avoid Lose Focus or Get Focus triggering events

 )

TEST_NAME: Classic Columns with images have alt text
QUERY_CLOB:
with std as (select case
                     when format_mask like 'IMAGE%' 
                     then 'N' 
                     when (coalesce((length(trim(lower(HTML_EXPRESSION))) - length(replace(trim(lower(HTML_EXPRESSION)),'<img',null)))/4, length(trim(lower(HTML_EXPRESSION))), 0) > 
                          coalesce((length(trim(lower(HTML_EXPRESSION))) - length(replace(trim(lower(HTML_EXPRESSION)),'alt="',null)))/5, length(trim(lower(HTML_EXPRESSION))), 0)) or
                          replace(trim(lower(HTML_EXPRESSION)),' ','') like '%alt=""%' or
                          trim(lower(HTML_EXPRESSION)) like '% alt %' 
                     then 'N' 
                     else 'Y'
                     end pass_yn,
                   HTML_EXPRESSION src,
                   application_id,application_name,page_id,page_name,region_id,region_name, column_alias,
                   last_updated_by, last_updated_on, build_option, heading, region_report_column_id,
						       workspace
            from apex_application_page_rpt_cols a
            where (format_mask like 'IMAGE%' or
                   trim(lower(HTML_EXPRESSION)) like '%<img%'))
select std.pass_yn,                          
       std.application_id, 
       std.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Classic Report Column `%0` (app %1, page %2) has an image with missing alt text: `%3`', 
        p0 => std.heading, 
        p1 => std.application_id,
        p2 => std.page_id,
				p3 => std.src) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Classic Report Column `%0` (app %1, page %2) has an image with missing alt text', 
        p0 => std.heading, 
        p1 => std.application_id,
        p2 => std.page_id) issue_title,
       std.region_report_column_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       std.heading,
			 std.src,
			 std.workspace
from std
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = std.page_id and aap.application_id = std.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = std.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = std.application_id
where std.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'

WCAG 2.0/2.1 - 1.1.1

searching images and if they have alt text set in html

TEST_NAME: Page items with html images have alt text
QUERY_CLOB:
with std as (select case
                    when display_as = 'Display Image'
                    then case when attribute_01 = 'DB_COLUMN' 
                              and trim(attribute_03) is null
                              then 'N'
                              when attribute_01 = 'SQL' 
                              and ((coalesce((length(lower(html_form_element_attributes)) - length(replace(lower(html_form_element_attributes),'<img',null)))/4, length(lower(html_form_element_attributes)), 0) > 
                                  coalesce((length(lower(html_form_element_attributes)) - length(replace(lower(html_form_element_attributes),'alt="',null)))/5, length(lower(html_form_element_attributes)), 0)) 
                                  or lower(replace(html_form_element_attributes,' ','')) like '%alt=""%' 
                                  or lower(html_form_element_attributes) like '% alt %' 
                                  or trim(html_form_element_attributes) is null)
                              then 'N'
                              when attribute_01 = 'URL' 
                              and trim(attribute_02) is null
                              then 'N'
                              else 'Y'
                              end 
                    when lower(item_source) like '%<img%'
                    then case when (coalesce((length(lower(item_source)) - length(replace(lower(item_source),'<img',null)))/4, length(lower(item_source)), 0) > 
                                  coalesce((length(lower(item_source)) - length(replace(lower(item_source),'alt="',null)))/5, length(lower(item_source)), 0))
                              or lower(replace(item_source,' ','')) like '%alt=""%' 
                              or lower(item_source) like '% alt %'
                              then 'N'
                              else 'Y'
                              end
                    when lower(pre_element_text) like '%<img%'
                    then case when (coalesce((length(lower(pre_element_text)) - length(replace(lower(pre_element_text),'<img',null)))/4, length(lower(pre_element_text)), 0) > 
                                  coalesce((length(lower(pre_element_text)) - length(replace(lower(pre_element_text),'alt="',null)))/5, length(lower(pre_element_text)), 0)) 
                              or lower(replace(pre_element_text,' ','')) like '%alt=""%' 
                              or lower(pre_element_text) like '% alt %'
                              then 'N'
                              else 'Y'
                              end
                    when lower(post_element_text) like '%<img%'
                    then case when (coalesce((length(lower(post_element_text)) - length(replace(lower(post_element_text),'<img',null)))/4, length(lower(post_element_text)), 0) > 
                                  coalesce((length(lower(post_element_text)) - length(replace(lower(post_element_text),'alt="',null)))/5, length(lower(post_element_text)), 0)) 
                              or lower(replace(post_element_text,' ','')) like '%alt=""%' 
                              or lower(post_element_text) like '% alt %'
                              then 'N'
                              else 'Y'
                              end
                    else 'Y'
                    end pass_yn, 
                    html_form_element_attributes src,
                    application_id,
                    page_id,
                    item_id,
                    workspace,
                    attribute_01,
                    html_form_element_attributes,
                    attribute_03,
                    attribute_02,
                    item_source,
                    pre_element_text,
                    post_element_text,
                    display_as,
                    html_table_cell_attr_element
                from apex_application_page_items)
select std.pass_yn,                          
       aapi.application_id, 
       aapi.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapi.last_updated_by,
       aapi.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('%4 Page Item `%0` (app %1, page %2) has an image with missing alt text (`%3`) [Based on : `%5`, alt text : `%6`]', 
        p0 => aapi.item_name, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id,
        p3 => std.src,
        p4 => std.display_as,
        p5 => std.attribute_01,
        p6 => std.attribute_02
        ) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Page Item `%0` (app %1, page %2) has an image with missing alt text', 
        p0 => aapi.item_name, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id) issue_title,
       aapi.item_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapi.item_name,
       std.src,
       std.workspace,
       std.attribute_01 based_on,
       std.html_form_element_attributes custom_attributes,
       std.attribute_03,
       std.attribute_02 alternative_text,
       std.item_source,
       std.pre_element_text,
       std.post_element_text,
       std.display_as,
       std.html_table_cell_attr_element column_attributes
from std
inner join apex_application_page_items aapi on std.application_id = aapi.application_id
                                            and std.page_id = aapi.page_id 
                                            and std.item_id = aapi.item_id
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapi.page_id and aap.application_id = aapi.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapi.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapi.application_id
where std.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION:
WCAG 2.0/2.1 - 1.1.1

searching images and if they have alt text set in html
FIX:
If the Page Item is of type 'Display Image':

*   if it is `based on` a `Image URL stored in Page Item Value` or `BLOB Column specified in Item Source` , you must supply a title + an aria-label to the `Alternative Text` (under settings) attribute

       aapi.updated_on last_updated_by,
       aapi.updated_by last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Report Column `%0` (app %1, page %2) has image with no alt text (`%3`)',

        p2 => aapi.page_id,
				p3 => aapi.src) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Report Column `%0` (app %1, page %2) has image with no alt text',

			 aapi.workspace
from aapi
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapi.page_id and aap.application_id = aapi.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option

WCAG 2.0/2.1 - 1.1.1

TEST_NAME: Page item labels must be unique
QUERY_CLOB:
with aapi as (select row_number( ) over (partition by workspace, application_id,page_id,trim(lower(label)) order by display_sequence nulls last) value_dup_cnt,
                   application_id, 
                   page_id, 
                   item_name,
                   label,
                   display_sequence,
                   build_option, 
                   item_id,
                   last_updated_on,
                   last_updated_by,
							     workspace
              from apex_application_page_items a
             where display_as_code not in ('NATIVE_HIDDEN')
             )
select case
         when (trim(aapi.label) is null
           or lower(trim(aapi.label)) = ' ') 
         then 'N' 
         when value_dup_cnt > 1 
         then 'N' 
         else 'Y'
       end pass_yn,                          
       aapi.application_id, 
       aapi.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapi.last_updated_by,
       aapi.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('There is more than one Page Item `%3` (`%0`) on page %2 (app %1). Page item labels must be unique for accessibility.', 
        p0 => aapi.item_name, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id,
        p3 => aapi.label) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('There is > 1 Page Item label `%0` (`%3`) on page %2 (app %1).', 
        p0 => aapi.label, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id,
        p3 => aapi.item_name) issue_title,
       aapi.item_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapi.item_name,
			 aapi.workspace
from aapi
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapi.page_id and aap.application_id = aapi.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapi.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapi.application_id

TEST_NAME: Regions on a page must be unique

                      page_id,
                      region_name,
                      parent_region_name,
                      display_sequence,

                      source_type, 
                      display_position,

                      region_id,

       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,

       aapr.display_sequence,
       aapr.parent_region_name,

TEST_NAME: Page JS should avoid intervals and timeouts
QUERY_CLOB:
with aap as (select case
                    when ((lower(trim(JAVASCRIPT_CODE)) like '%setinterval%'
                             or lower(trim(JAVASCRIPT_CODE)) like '%settimeout%'
                             or lower(trim(JAVASCRIPT_CODE_ONLOAD)) like '%setinterval%'
                             or lower(trim(JAVASCRIPT_CODE_ONLOAD)) like '%settimeout%')) 
                    then 'N' 
                    else 'Y'
                    end pass_yn,
                    application_id,
                    page_id,
                    build_option,
                    page_mode,
                    created_by,
                    created_on,
                    last_updated_by,
                    last_updated_on,
                    page_name,
						        workspace
            from apex_application_pages a

)
select aap.pass_yn,                          
       aap.application_id, 
       aap.page_id,
       aap.created_by,
       aap.created_on,
       aap.last_updated_by,
       aap.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Page `%0` (app %1, page %2) has inaccessible JS', 
        p0 => aap.page_name, 
        p1 => aap.application_id,
        p2 => aap.page_id) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Page `%0` (app %1, page %2) has inaccessible JS', 
        p0 => aap.page_name, 
        p1 => aap.application_id,
        p2 => aap.page_id) issue_title,
       aap.page_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aap.page_name,
       aap.page_mode,
			 aap.workspace
from aap
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aap.application_id
where aap.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION: WCAG 2.0/2.1 - 2.2.2 Pause, Stop, Hide - 2.3.1 Three Flashes or Below ThresholdChecking pages for inline CSS for blinking or animation logic

TEST_NAME: DA should avoid js that is setting intervals or timeouts
QUERY_CLOB:
with aapd as (select case
                      when ((lower(trim(attribute_01)) like '%setinterval%'
                             or lower(trim(attribute_01)) like '%settimeout%'
                             or lower(trim(attribute_01)) like '%setinterval%'
                             or lower(trim(attribute_01)) like '%settimeout%')) 
                      then 'N' 
                      else 'Y'
                    end pass_yn,
                    application_id,
                    page_id,
                    dynamic_action_name,
                    action_pd_name,
                    dynamic_action_event_result,
                    last_updated_by,
                    last_updated_on,
                    build_option,
                    dynamic_action_id,
                    action_id,
                    attribute_01,
							      workspace
            from apex_application_page_da_acts a
            where action_code = 'NATIVE_JAVASCRIPT_CODE')
select aapd.pass_yn,                          
       aapd.application_id, 
       aapd.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapd.last_updated_by,
       aapd.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Dynamic Action Action `%0` (app %1, page %2) has js that is setting intervals or timeouts : `%3`', 
        p0 => aapd.dynamic_action_name, 
        p1 => aapd.application_id,
        p2 => aapd.page_id,
        p3 => substr(attribute_01,1,50)) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Dynamic Action Action `%0` (app %1, page %2) has js that is not accessible', 
        p0 => aapd.dynamic_action_name, 
        p1 => aapd.application_id,
        p2 => aapd.page_id) issue_title,
       aapd.action_id component_id,
       aapd.dynamic_action_id parent_component_id,
       aapd.dynamic_action_name,
       aapd.attribute_01,
			 aapd.workspace
from aapd
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapd.page_id and aap.application_id = aapd.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapd.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapd.application_id
where aapd.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION: WCAG 2.0/2.1 - 2.2.2 Pause, Stop, Hide - 2.3.1 Three Flashes or Below ThresholdChecking pages for inline CSS for blinking or animation logic

TEST_NAME: Page names should be unique
QUERY_CLOB:
with aap as (select application_id,
                    page_id,
                    lower(trim(page_name)) lower_case_page_name,
                    ROW_NUMBER( ) OVER (PARTITION BY workspace, application_id,lower(trim(page_name)) ORDER BY page_id NULLS LAST) value_dup_cnt,
                    created_by,
                    created_on,
                    last_updated_by,
                    last_updated_on,
                    build_option,
                    page_mode,
                    page_name,
						        workspace
            from apex_application_pages)
select case when aap.value_dup_cnt > 1 
            then 'N' 
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,                          
       aap.application_id, 
       aap.page_id,
       aap.created_by,
       aap.created_on,
       aap.last_updated_by,
       aap.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Page `%0` (app %1, page %2) is not unique. Page names should be unique for accessibility.', 
        p0 => aap.page_name, 
        p1 => aap.application_id,
        p2 => aap.page_id) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Page `%0` (app %1, page %2) is not unique', 
        p0 => aap.page_name, 
        p1 => aap.application_id,
        p2 => aap.page_id) issue_title,
       aap.page_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aap.page_name,
       aap.page_mode,
			 aap.workspace
from aap
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aap.application_id
where aap.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION: WCAG 2.0/2.1 - 2.4.2 Page TitledChecking page title for uniqueness and provide list of page titles to be manual checked if they are descriptive of topic or purpose \*\* trimming out whitespace and converting to lower case for uniqueness

       apex_string.format('Interactive Report Column `%0` (app %1, page %2) link is missing title & aria (attr `%3`, html `%4`)', 
        p0 => aapic.column_alias, 
        p1 => aapic.application_id,
        p2 => aapic.page_id,
				p3 => aapic.column_link_attr,
			  p4 => aapic.html_expression) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Report Column `%0` (app %1, page %2) link is missing title & aria', 
        p0 => aapic.column_alias,

        p2 => aapic.page_id) issue_title,

TEST_NAME: Page Templates should avoid CSS animations
QUERY_CLOB:

TEST_NAME: IR detail link must contain aria and title
QUERY_CLOB:
with aapi as (select lower(trim(detail_link_attributes))||detail_link_text src,
                  page_id,
                  application_id,
                  region_name,
                  detail_link_attributes,
                  detail_link_target,
                  detail_link_text,
                  region_id,
                  created_by,
                  created_on,
                  updated_by,
                  updated_on,
							    workspace
             from apex_application_page_ir aa
             where detail_link_target is not null)
select case  when ((src not like '%aria-%'
                            and src not like '%title%')
                            or src is null ) 
             then 'N' 
             else 'Y'
             end pass_yn,             
       aapi.application_id, 
       aapi.page_id,
       aapi.created_by,
       aapi.created_on,
       aapi.updated_by last_updated_by,
       aapi.updated_on last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Report `%0` (app %1, page %2) detail link is missing aria & title', 
        p0 => aapi.region_name, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Report `%0` (app %1, page %2) detail link is missing aria & title', 
        p0 => aapi.region_name, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id) issue_title,
       aapi.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapi.region_name,
       aapi.src,
			 aapi.workspace
from aapi
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapi.page_id and aap.application_id = aapi.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id

TEST_NAME: Some fields benefit from an autocomplete attribute
QUERY_CLOB:
with aapi as (select case
                     when (lower(trim(HTML_FORM_ELEMENT_ATTRIBUTES)) not like '%autocomplete%'
                           or trim(HTML_FORM_ELEMENT_ATTRIBUTES) is null) 
                     then 'N' 
                     else 'Y'
                   end pass_yn,
                   application_id,
                   application_name, 
                   page_id, 
                   page_name,
                   region, 
                   item_name,
                   HTML_FORM_ELEMENT_ATTRIBUTES,
                   label,
                   workspace,
                   last_updated_by,
                   last_updated_on,
                   build_option,
                   item_help_text,
                   item_id,
                   display_as,
							     display_as_code
              from apex_application_page_items 
             where display_as_code not in ('NATIVE_HIDDEN','NATIVE_CHECKBOX','NATIVE_SINGLE_CHECKBOX', 'NATIVE_RADIOGROUP','NATIVE_YES_NO')
						 and lower(item_name) not like '%api%'
             and (
                    (lower(label) like '%name%' and (lower(label) like '%first%' or lower(label) like '%last%' or lower(label) like '%family%'))
                    or 
                    (lower(label) like '%address%')
                    or 
                    (lower(label) like '%phone number%')
                    or 
                    (lower(label) like '%mail%')
                    or 
                    (lower(label) like '%birthday%' or lower(label) like '%bday%')
                 )
 )
select aapi.pass_yn,
       aapi.workspace workspace,
       aapi.application_id, 
       aapi.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapi.last_updated_by,
       aapi.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('`%3`/`%5` Page Item `%0`/`%4` (app %1, page %2) could benefit from an autocomplete attribute', 
        p0 => aapi.item_name, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id,
        p3 => aapi.display_as,
        p4 => aapi.label,
        p5 => aapi.display_as_code) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Page Item `%0` (app %1, page %2) is missing autocomplete', 
        p0 => aapi.item_name, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id) issue_title,
       aapi.item_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapi.item_name,
       aapi.item_help_text,
       aapi.display_as,
       aapi.display_as_code,
       aapi.label
from aapi
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapi.page_id
                                      and aap.application_id = aapi.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = aapi.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapi.application_id
where aapi.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION:
WCAG 2.1 - 1.3.5 Identify Input Purpose. Checking that inputs fields have autocomplete where appropriate

https://www.w3.org/WAI/WCAG21/Understanding/identify-input-purpose.html

https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG21/#input-purposes
FIX: Add the appropriate [autocomplete attribute](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Attributes/autocomplete). For example, add `autocomplete="email"`  to the `Custom Attributes` field

TEST_NAME: Foreign keys must be indexed
QUERY_CLOB:
with tblfk as (select 
cons.table_name, 
cons.constraint_name,
cons.cname1 || nvl2(cons.cname2,','||cons.cname2,null) ||
nvl2(cons.cname3,','||cons.cname3,null) || nvl2(cons.cname4,','||cons.cname4,null) ||
nvl2(cons.cname5,','||cons.cname5,null) || nvl2(cons.cname6,','||cons.cname6,null) ||
nvl2(cons.cname7,','||cons.cname7,null) || nvl2(cons.cname8,','||cons.cname8,null) icolumns
from ( select b.table_name,
                b.constraint_name,
                max(decode( position, 1, column_name, null )) cname1,
                max(decode( position, 2, column_name, null )) cname2,
                max(decode( position, 3, column_name, null )) cname3,
                max(decode( position, 4, column_name, null )) cname4,
                max(decode( position, 5, column_name, null )) cname5,
                max(decode( position, 6, column_name, null )) cname6,
                max(decode( position, 7, column_name, null )) cname7,
                max(decode( position, 8, column_name, null )) cname8,
                count(*) col_cnt
            from (select substr(table_name,1,30) table_name,
                        substr(constraint_name,1,30) constraint_name,
                        substr(column_name,1,30) column_name,
                        position
                    from v_user_cons_columns ) a,
                v_user_constraints b
        where a.constraint_name = b.constraint_name
            and b.constraint_type = 'R'
        group by b.table_name, b.constraint_name
        ) cons
where cons.col_cnt > ALL
        ( select count(*)
            from v_user_ind_columns i
            where i.table_name = cons.table_name
            and i.column_name in (cname1, cname2, cname3, cname4,
                                    cname5, cname6, cname7, cname8 )
            and i.column_position <= cons.col_cnt
            group by i.index_name
        )
)
select 
'N' pass_yn,
'MISSING_FK :'||table_name unqid,
table_name, constraint_name, icolumns,
apex_string.format('Constraint %0 on column(s) %1 is missing an index', constraint_name, icolumns) code,
ao.object_id
from tblfk
inner join all_objects ao on ao.object_name = tblfk.table_name
                          and ao.object_type = 'TABLE'
EXPLANATION: Foreign keys must be indexed
FIX: Eg `create index eba_stdapp_idx1 on eba_stds_applications (type_id)`

TEST_NAME: Unused identifers
QUERY_CLOB:
with  declared_ids  
            as (select object_name  
                  , object_type  
                  , name
                  , type
                  , signature
                  , line
                  from v_user_identifiers
                  where usage = 'DECLARATION'
                  and type in ('VARIABLE', 'EXCEPTION','CONSTANT')

select 
case when it.signature is null

		 else 'Y'
     end as pass_yn,

di.object_type, 
apex_string.format('Variable %0 should be dropped (it is unused)',di.name) code, 
di.type,
di.line,
to_char(di.signature) unqid
from declared_ids di
left join intersct it on  di.signature = it.signature
EXPLANATION: This identifier has been declared but is not referenced anywhere.
FIX: Remove the identifier or use it

TEST_NAME: Missing DBMS_ASSERT
QUERY_CLOB:
with userprocs as (select object_name, object_type, type, name proc_name, line start_line, LEAD(line, 1, 10000) OVER (partition by object_name ORDER BY line) end_line
                    from v_user_identifiers
                    where 1=1
                    and object_type = 'PACKAGE BODY'
                    and usage_context_id = 1
                    and type in ('FUNCTION', 'PROCEDURE')
                    and object_name not like 'XXX%'
                    and sys_context( 'userenv', 'current_schema' ) not in ('UT_CARS')
                    ),
     exec_imm as (select object_name, line ei_line, signature
                    from v_user_statements
                    where type = 'EXECUTE IMMEDIATE'
                    and object_type = 'PACKAGE BODY'
                 ),
     dass as (select name object_name, line da_line, text
                from v_user_source
                where lower(text) like '%dbms_assert%'
                and type = 'PACKAGE BODY')
select 
'N' pass_yn,
u.object_name, 
u.object_type, 
apex_string.format('%0 should use dbms_assert to safely use `execute immediate`',u.proc_name) code, 
ei.ei_line line, 
to_char(ei.signature) unqid
from userprocs u
inner join exec_imm ei on ei.object_name = u.object_name
                       and ei.ei_line between u.start_line and u.end_line
left join dass da on da.object_name = u.object_name
                  and da.da_line between u.start_line and u.end_line
where da.da_line is null
EXPLANATION: "Execute Immediate" should be validated with DBMS\_ASSERT : Input must be sanitized
FIX: Use dbms\_assert. If all else fails, you can always use `DBMS_ASSERT.NOOP`

TEST_NAME: Duplicate Statements
QUERY_CLOB:
select
'N' pass_yn,
us.object_name, 
us.object_type,
us.line, 
apex_string.format('Consolidate instances of `%0` in `%1` %2', 
									 p0 => substr(trim(us.text),1,30),
									 p1 => us.object_name,

EXPLANATION: This statement appears more than once. Duplicate statements may cause inefficiency

TEST_NAME: Naming Convention violation
QUERY_CLOB:
with var_assgn as (select signature, max(line) last_line
                    from v_user_identifiers ui
                    where ui.type = 'VARIABLE'
                    and ui.usage = 'ASSIGNMENT'
                    group by signature),
     cur_ref_count
            as (select signature, count(*) refcount
                  from v_user_identifiers
                  where usage = 'REFERENCE'
                  and type = 'CONSTANT'
                  group by signature),
     ccode 
            as (select
                case when ui.type = 'CONSTANT' 
                        then case when ui.object_type = 'PACKAGE'
                                  then case when (ui.name not like 'GC_%') 
                                            then 'SPEC_CONSTANT'
                                            end
                                  when ui.object_type = 'PACKAGE BODY' 
                                    then case when ui.usage_context_id  = 1
                                              then case when ui.name not like 'GC_%'
                                                        then 'GLOBAL_CONSTANT'
                                                        else case when crc.refcount < 2
                                                                  then case when ui.name not in ('GC_SCOPE_PREFIX', 'GC_N', 'GC_Y')
                                                                            then 'LOCAL_GLOBAL_CONSTANT'
                                                                            end
                                                                  end 
                                                        end
                                              else case when  (ui.name not like 'C_%')
                                                        then 'LOCAL_CONSTANT'
                                                        end
                                              end
                                 end
                     when ui.type = 'VARIABLE'
                     then case when ui.object_type = 'PACKAGE'
                               then 'SPEC_VARIABLE'
                               when ui.object_type = 'PACKAGE BODY'
                               then case when ui.line = va.last_line
                                         then 'CONSTANT_VARIABLE'
                                         end
                               end
                     when ui.type in ('CURSOR','REFCURSOR') 
                     then case when ui.name not like 'CUR_%'
                               then 'CURSOR'
                               end 
                     when ui.type in ('INDEX TABLE', 'NESTED TABLE', 'ASSOCIATIVE ARRAY') 
                     then case when ui.name not like 'T_%'
                               then 'TABLE_TYPE'
                               end
                     when ui.type in ('FORMAL IN','FORMAL OUT', 'FORMAL IN OUT') 
                     then case when ui.name not like 'P_%'
                               then 'PROC_PARAM'
                               end
                     when ui.type = 'RECORD'
                     then case when ui.name not like 'R_%'
                               then 'RECORD_TYPE'
                               end 
                     when ui.type in ('BLOB DATATYPE','BOOLEAN DATATYPE','CHARACTER DATATYPE','CLOB DATATYPE','DATE DATATYPE','NUMBER DATATYPE', 'SUBTYPE','TIMESTAMP DATATYPE')
                     then case when ui.name not like 'TY_%'
                               then 'DATATYPE'
                               end
                     when ui.type = 'EXCEPTION'
                     then case when ui.name not like 'E_%'
                               then 'EXCEPTION'
                               end
                     end as child_code,
                null src_id, 
                ui.object_name, 
                ui.name code, 
                ui.object_type, 
                ui.line,
                to_char(ui.signature) unqid
                from v_user_identifiers ui
                left join var_assgn va on ui.signature = va.signature
                left join cur_ref_count crc on ui.signature = crc.signature
                where ui.usage = 'DECLARATION'
                and ui.implicit = 'NO'
                and ui.object_name not like 'XXX%')
select 
case when child_code is null
    then 'Y'
    else 'N'
    end pass_yn,
object_name,
apex_string.format('%0 %1 in `%2` %3, line %4',
                    p0 => code,
                    p1 => case child_code 
                          when 'CONSTANT_VARIABLE'
                          then 'must be a constant (it is currently a variable)'
                          when 'CURSOR'
                          then 'must begin with cur_ (it is a cursor)'
                          when 'DATATYPE'
                          then 'must begin with ty_ (it is a datatype)'
                          when 'EXCEPTION'
                          then 'must begin with e_ (it is an Exception)'
                          when 'GLOBAL_CONSTANT'
                          then 'must begin with gc_ (it is a package body global constant)'
                          when 'LOCAL_CONSTANT'
                          then 'must begin with c_ (it is a package body local constant) '
                          when 'LOCAL_GLOBAL_CONSTANT'
                          then 'should be a local constant (it is currently a global constant)'
                          when 'PROC_PARAM'
                          then 'must begin with p_ (it is a procedure parameter)'
                          when 'RECORD_TYPE'
                          then 'must begin with r_ (it is a Record type)'
                          when 'SPEC_CONSTANT'
                          then 'must begin with gc_ (it is a package spec constant)'
                          when 'SPEC_VARIABLE'
                          then 'should be moved to the package body'
                          when 'TABLE_TYPE'
                          then 'must being with t_ (it is a Table type)'
                          end,
									 p2 => object_name,
									 p3 => object_type,
									 p4 => line
) code,
object_type,
line,
unqid
from ccode
where child_code is not null
EXPLANATION:
*   CONSTANT\_VARIABLE : This variable should be a constant
*   CURSOR : Cursor names must begin with cur\_
*   DATATYPE : Datatypes must begin with ty\_
*   EXCEPTION : Exceptions must begin with e\_
*   GLOBAL\_CONSTANT : Package body global constants must begin with gc\_
*   LOCAL\_CONSTANT : Package body local constants must begin with c\_
*   LOCAL\_GLOBAL\_CONSTANT : This global constant should be a local constant
*   PROC\_PARAM : Procedure parameters must begin with p\_
*   RECORD\_TYPE : Record types must begin with r\_
*   SPEC\_CONSTANT : Package spec constants must begin with gc\_
*   SPEC\_VARIABLE : Variables in the package spec are discouraged
*   TABLE\_TYPE : Table types must begin with t\_
FIX:
*   CONSTANT\_VARIABLE : Make the variable a constant
*   CURSOR : Fix the name
*   DATATYPE : Fix the name
*   EXCEPTION : Fix the name
*   GLOBAL\_CONSTANT : Fix the name
*   LOCAL\_CONSTANT : Fix the name
*   LOCAL\_GLOBAL\_CONSTANT : Make it a local constant
*   PROC\_PARAM : Fix the name
*   RECORD\_TYPE : Fix the name
*   SPEC\_CONSTANT : Fix the name
*   SPEC\_VARIABLE : Remove the variable from the package spec
*   TABLE\_TYPE : Fix the name

TEST_NAME: Button URLs should be valid
QUERY_CLOB:
select 
a110.pass_yn,
a110.application_id,
a110.page_id,
a110.page_name,
a110.redirect_url,
a110.button_name,  
a110.label, 
a110.region,
a110.created_by,
a110.created_on,
a110.last_updated_by, 
a110.last_updated_on,
case when a110.pass_yn = 'N'
     then apex_string.format(p_message => 
     q'^Button, `%1`/`%2`, has an invalid link: `%0` (region : `%3`)^',
     p0 => a110.redirect_url,
     p1 => a110.button_name,  
     p2 => a110.label, 
     p3 => a110.region
     )
     end as validation_failure_message,
case when a110.pass_yn = 'N'
     then apex_string.format(p_message => 
     q'^Button has an invalid link (page %0, app %1)^',
     p0 => a110.page_id,
     p1 => a110.application_id
     )
     end as issue_title,
a110.component_id,

a110.workspace
from (
    select 
    eba_stds_parser.is_valid_url (p_origin_app_id => bl.application_id,
                                p_url           => bl.redirect_url
                                ) pass_yn,
    bl.application_id, 
    bl.redirect_url,
    bl.page_id,
    bl.page_name,
    bl.button_name,  
    bl.label, 
    bl.region,
    app.created_by,
    app.created_on,
    coalesce(bl.last_updated_by, app.last_updated_by) last_updated_by, 
    coalesce(bl.last_updated_on, app.last_updated_on) last_updated_on,
	  bl.button_id component_id,
	  null parent_component_id,
	  bl.workspace
    from apex_application_page_buttons bl
    inner join apex_application_pages app on  app.page_id = bl.page_id
                                          and app.application_id = bl.application_id
    inner join v_apex_applications aa1 on bl.application_id = aa1.application_id
                                       and aa1.availability_status != 'Unavailable'
	  left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = app.build_option
                                                         and aabo1.application_id = app.application_id
    left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = bl.build_option
                                                         and aabo2.application_id = bl.application_id
	  where bl.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
    and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
    and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
) a110
EXPLANATION: The button URL is invalid
FIX: Fix the URL or eliminate the button

TEST_NAME: List URLs should be valid
QUERY_CLOB:
with 
    plug_link_count as (
        select pl.list_id, count(*) lcount
            from apex_application_page_regions pl
            group by pl.list_id
        ),
    nav_link_count as (
        select ui.navigation_list_id, count(*) lcount
            from apex_appl_user_interfaces ui
            group by ui.navigation_list_id
        ),
    nav_bar_link_count as (
        select ui.nav_bar_list_id, count(*) lcount
            from apex_appl_user_interfaces ui
            group by ui.nav_bar_list_id
        ),
    a120 as (
        select
        eba_stds_parser.is_valid_url (p_origin_app_id => ale.application_id,
                                    p_url           => ale.entry_target
                                    ) pass_yn,
        ale.application_id,
        ale.entry_target,
        ale.list_name,
        ale.list_id, 
        ale.list_entry_id component_id,
			  ale.list_entry_parent_id parent_component_id,
        ale.entry_text,
        coalesce(plc.lcount,0) + coalesce(nlc.lcount,0) + coalesce(nblc.lcount,0) ref_count,
        ale.condition_type_code,
        ale.build_option,
        bo.build_option_status,
			  bo.status_on_export,
        aa1.created_on,
        aa1.created_by,
        ale.last_updated_by, 
        ale.last_updated_on,
			  ale.workspace
        from apex_application_list_entries ale
        inner join v_apex_applications aa1 on ale.application_id = aa1.application_id
                                        and aa1.availability_status != 'Unavailable'
        left join apex_application_build_options bo on ale.application_id = bo.application_id
                                                    and ale.build_option = bo.build_option_name
        left join plug_link_count plc on plc.list_id = ale.list_id
        left join nav_link_count nlc on nlc.navigation_list_id = ale.list_id
        left join nav_bar_link_count nblc on nblc.nav_bar_list_id = ale.list_id
        where ale.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
			  and (ale.condition_type_code != 'NEVER' or ale.condition_type_code is null)
        and (bo.status_on_export != 'Exclude' or bo.status_on_export is null)
    )
select 
a120.pass_yn,
a120.application_id,
null page_id,
a120.entry_target,
a120.list_name,
a120.list_id, 
a120.component_id,
a120.entry_text,
a120.ref_count,
a120.condition_type_code,
a120.build_option,
a120.build_option_status,
a120.created_by,
a120.created_on,
a120.last_updated_by, 
a120.last_updated_on,
case when a120.pass_yn = 'N'
     then apex_string.format(p_message => 
     q'^List entry (%4,%3) in list (%1, %2) has an invalid link: %0 (build: %7)^',
     p0 => a120.entry_target,
     p1 => a120.list_name,
     p2 => a120.list_id, 
     p3 => a120.component_id,
     p4 => a120.entry_text,
     p5 => a120.ref_count,
     p6 => a120.condition_type_code,
     p7 => a120.build_option,
     p8 => a120.build_option_status
     )
     end as validation_failure_message,
case when a120.pass_yn = 'N'
     then apex_string.format(p_message => 
     q'^Invalid link in list entry (%4) in list %1, app %0^',
     p0 => a120.application_id,
     p1 => a120.list_name,
     p2 => a120.list_id, 
     p3 => a120.component_id,
     p4 => a120.entry_text
     )
     end as issue_title,
a120.parent_component_id,
a120.workspace
from a120

a70.pass_yn,

     where prc.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
