TEST_NAME: Public pages should not require authentication
QUERY_CLOB:
select a60.pass_yn, 
       a60.application_id,
       a60.page_id, 
       a60.page_name, 
       a60.page_access_protection, 
       a60.page_mode,
       a60.page_requires_authentication,
       a60.build_option,
       a60.build_option_status,
       a60.authorization_scheme,
       a60.last_updated_by, 
       a60.last_updated_on, 
       a60.created_by, 
       a60.created_on,
       case when a60.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format(p_message => 
            q'^Public pages should not have authorization scheme. This page has authorization scheme: %5^',
            p0 => a60.page_access_protection, 
            p1 => a60.page_mode,
            p2 => a60.page_requires_authentication,
            p3 => a60.build_option,
            p4 => a60.build_option_status,
            p5 => a60.authorization_scheme,
            p6 => a60.last_updated_by, 
            p7 => a60.last_updated_on, 
            p8 => a60.created_by, 
            p9 => a60.created_on
            )
            end as validation_failure_message,
       case when a60.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format(p_message => 
            q'^Remove authorization scheme from public page %0 (app %1)^',
            p0 => a60.page_id, 
            p1 => a60.application_id
            )
            end as issue_title,
			 a60.page_id component_id,
			 null parent_component_id,
			 a60.workspace
from (
     select 
     case when aap.page_requires_authentication = 'No'
          then case when aap.authorization_scheme is null
                    then 'Y'
                    else case when aap.authorization_scheme = 'APPLICATION SENTRY'
                              then 'Y'
                              else 'N'
                              end
                    end
          else 'Y'
          end as pass_yn, 
     aap.application_id,
     aap.page_id, 
     aap.page_name, 
     aap.page_access_protection, 
     aap.page_mode,
     aap.page_requires_authentication,
     aap.build_option,
     bo.build_option_status,
	   bo.status_on_export,
     aap.authorization_scheme,
     aap.created_by created_by, 
     aap.created_on created_on,
     aap.last_updated_by, 
     aap.last_updated_on,
	   aap.workspace
     from apex_application_pages aap
     inner join v_apex_applications aa on aap.application_id = aa.application_id
                                     and aa.availability_status != 'Unavailable'
     left join apex_application_build_options bo on aap.application_id = bo.application_id
                                                 and aap.build_option = bo.build_option_name
     where aap.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
	   and (bo.status_on_export != 'Exclude' or bo.build_option_status is null)
) a60
EXPLANATION: Public pages should be public but they can be victims of an over-zealous attempt to give all pages an authorization scheme
FIX: Remove the authorization scheme

TEST_NAME: Button Authorization Matches Destination
QUERY_CLOB:
select case when coalesce(spu.element_authorization, 'N/A') =  coalesce (aap.authorization_scheme, 'N/A')
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       spu.application_id, 
       spu.page_id, 
			 null created_on,
			 null created_by,
       spu.last_updated_by,
       spu.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('The authorization scheme (%3) on button `%0` (page %1, app %2) does not match the destination (page %4, authorization `%5`)',
                          p0 => spu.element_label,
                          p1 => spu.page_id,
                          p2 => spu.application_id,
                          p3 => coalesce(spu.element_authorization,'null'),
                          p4 => spu.destination_page_id,
                          p5 => coalesce(aap.authorization_scheme,'null')
                          ) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('The authorization scheme on button `%0` (page %1, app %2) does not match the destination',
                          p0 => spu.element_label,
                          p1 => spu.page_id,
                          p2 => spu.application_id
                          ) issue_title,
       spu.page_authorization, 
       spu.url_type, 
       spu.element_label, 
       spu.element_name, 
       spu.parent_element_name, 
       spu.destination_app_id, 
       spu.destination_page_id, 
       aap.authorization_scheme dest_author_schema, 
       spu.element_authorization,
			 spu.element_id component_id,
			 spu.parent_element_id parent_component_id,
			 aap.workspace
 from mv_svt_buttons spu
 inner join apex_application_pages aap on spu.destination_app_id = aap.application_id
                                       and spu.destination_page_id = aap.page_id
 where spu.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
 and url_type = 'BUTTON_URL'
 and spu.destination_app_id = spu.application_id
 and spu.destination_page_id != spu.page_id
EXPLANATION: The authorization scheme of a button should match that of its destination
FIX: Add the requisite authorization scheme to the button

TEST_NAME: Regular Pages should be Current in Navigation
QUERY_CLOB:
select 'N'  pass_yn,
       aap.application_id,
       aap.page_id,
       aap.created_by,
       aap.created_on,
       aap.last_updated_by,
       aap.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Page %0 (app %1) should be listed as current for an entry in the navigation menu (%2)',
                          p0 => aap.page_id,
                          p1 => aap.application_id,
                          p2 => aa.navigation_list
                        ) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Page %0 (app %1) is not listed as current for any entry in the navigation menu',
                          p0 => aap.page_id,
                          p1 => aap.application_id
                        ) issue_title,
       aap.build_option,
       abo.build_option_status,
       abo.status_on_export,
       aa.navigation_list,
       aap.page_template,
			 aap.page_id component_id,
			 null parent_component_id,
			 aap.workspace
from apex_application_pages aap
inner join apex_applications aa on aap.application_id = aa.application_id
                                and aa.navigation_list is not null
left outer join (select ale.application_id, cfpg.column_value page_id
                    from apex_application_list_entries ale
                    join table(apex_string.split(ale.current_for_pages_expression, ',')) cfpg on ale.current_for_pages_type_code = 'COLON_DELIMITED_PAGE_LIST'
                    join apex_applications aa on  ale.application_id = aa.application_id
                                              and ale.list_name = aa.navigation_list
                    where cfpg.column_value is not null
                    and validate_conversion(cfpg.column_value as number) = 1
                ) cdpl on  cdpl.application_id =  aap.application_id
                       and cdpl.page_id = aap.page_id
left outer join (select ale.application_id, eba_stds_parser.page_from_url (p_origin_app_id => ale.application_id, p_url => ale.entry_target) page_id
                    from apex_application_list_entries ale
                    join apex_applications aa on  ale.application_id = aa.application_id
                                              and ale.list_name = aa.navigation_list
                    where ale.current_for_pages_type_code = 'TARGET_PAGE'
                ) tp on  tp.application_id = aap.application_id
                     and tp.page_id = aap.page_id
left outer join (select application_id, page_id, count(*) proc_count
                    from apex_application_page_proc
                    where process_type = 'Form - Initialization'
                    group by application_id, page_id
                ) pp on  pp.application_id = aap.application_id
                     and pp.page_id = aap.page_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options abo on abo.application_id = aap.application_id 
                                                   and abo.build_option_name = aap.build_option
where aap.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE') 
and aap.page_mode = 'Normal'
and aap.page_id not in (0,101,9999)
and cdpl.application_id is null 
and tp.application_id is null
and pp.proc_count is null
and coalesce(abo.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aap.page_template not like 'AO%'
EXPLANATION: All non-form, normal Pages should be Current in the Navigation Menu : Normal non-form pages should be listed as current for a navigation menu list entry
FIX: Make the page `current` for a navigation menu list entry

                          p0 => spu.element_label,
                          p1 => spu.page_id,
                          p2 => spu.application_id,
                          p3 => coalesce(spu.element_authorization,'null'),
                          p4 => spu.destination_page_id,
                          p5 => coalesce(aap.authorization_scheme,'null')
                          ) validation_failure_message,
        apex_string.format('The authorization scheme on the page branch (page %1, app %2) does not match the destination',
                          p0 => spu.element_label,
                          p1 => spu.page_id,
                          p2 => spu.application_id
                          ) issue_title,
       spu.page_authorization, 
       spu.url_type, 
       spu.element_label, 
       spu.element_name,
       spu.destination_app_id, 
       spu.destination_page_id, 
       aap.authorization_scheme dest_author_schema, 
       spu.element_authorization,
			 aap.build_option,
       abo.build_option_status,
       abo.status_on_export,
			 spu.page_id component_id,
	     null parent_component_id,
			 aap.workspace
 from mv_svt_page_branch spu
 inner join apex_application_pages aap on spu.destination_app_id = aap.application_id
                                       and spu.destination_page_id = aap.page_id
 left outer join apex_application_build_options abo on abo.application_id = aap.application_id 
                                                    and abo.build_option_name = aap.build_option
 where spu.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
 and spu.destination_page_id != spu.page_id
 and coalesce(spu.page_mode,'NA') not in ('Modal Dialog')
 and coalesce(abo.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION: The authorization scheme of a page branch should match that of its destination
FIX: Add the requisite authorization scheme to the page branch

TEST_NAME: Pages should be reachable
QUERY_CLOB:
select 'N' pass_yn,
       aap.application_id,
       aap.page_id,
       aap.created_by,
       aap.created_on,
       aap.last_updated_by,
       aap.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Page %0 (`%2`, app %1) is unreachable. please link to it / delete it / put under a `dev_only` build.',
                          p0 => aap.page_id,
                          p1 => aap.application_id,
                          p2 => aap.page_name) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Page %0 (app %1) is unreachable',
                          p0 => aap.page_id,
                          p1 => aap.application_id) issue_title,
       aap.build_option,
       abo.build_option_status,
       aap.page_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aap.workspace,
       aap.page_name
from apex_application_pages aap
left outer join v_mv_svt spu on spu.destination_app_id = aap.application_id
                                            and spu.destination_page_id = aap.page_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options abo on abo.application_id = aap.application_id 
                                                   and abo.build_option_name = aap.build_option
where aap.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and spu.destination_page_id is null
and aap.page_id not in (0,1,101,9999)
and coalesce(abo.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION: Pages that are not linked to should be removed to declutter the application : This page is not linked to from anywhere. If this page is not in use, it should be removed to declutter the application
FIX: Delete the page or link to it.

TEST_NAME: Button display positions should not be legacy or deprecated
QUERY_CLOB:
select case when svt_apex_view.display_position_is_violation (
                p_display_position_code => aapb.display_position_code,
                p_template_id           => apr.template_id,
                p_application_id        => aapb.application_id) = 'Y'
						then 'N'
						else 'Y'
						end pass_yn, 
       aapb.application_id, 
       aapb.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapb.last_updated_by,
       aapb.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Button `%0` (page %1, app %2) is in an invalid (legacy or deprecated) display position (`%3`)',
              p0 => aapb.button_name,
              p1 => aapb.page_id,
              p2 => aapb.application_id,
              p3 => aapb.display_position_code
            ) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Button `%0` in legacy / deprecated position (page %1, app %2)',
              p0 => aapb.button_name,
              p1 => aapb.page_id,
              p2 => aapb.application_id
            ) issue_title,
       aapb.button_id component_id, 
       null parent_component_id,
       aapb.display_position,
       aapb.display_position_code,
       apr.template_id,
       aapb.button_name,
			 aapb.workspace
from apex_application_page_buttons aapb
inner join apex_application_page_regions apr on aapb.region_id = apr.region_id
                                             and aapb.application_id = apr.application_id
                                             and aapb.page_id = apr.page_id
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapb.page_id and aap.application_id = aapb.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapb.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapb.application_id
where aapb.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION: Buttons should not be placed in display positions are deprecated or legacy
FIX: Correct the button display position

select case when coalesce(spu.element_authorization, 'N/A') =  coalesce (aap.authorization_scheme, 'N/A')
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,

TEST_NAME: Pages should not have unresolved critical issues
QUERY_CLOB:
with maxpvi as (select application_id, 
                       page_id, 
                       max(page_view_id) max_page_view_id
                  from apex_debug_messages
                  group by application_id, page_id),
     msglvl1 as (select adm.application_id, 
                        adm.page_id, 
                        adm.page_view_id, 
                        adm.message_level,
                        max(message) max_message
                from maxpvi
                inner join apex_debug_messages adm on maxpvi.max_page_view_id = adm.page_view_id
                                                   and adm.message_level in (1)
                group by adm.application_id, adm.page_id, adm.page_view_id, adm.message_level)
select 'N' pass_yn,
       aap.workspace,
       aap.application_id, 
       aap.page_id,
       aap.created_by,
       aap.created_on,
       aap.last_updated_by,
       aap.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Page `%0` (app %1, page %2) has a critical (message level %5) error: `%3`, page_view_id : `%4`', 
        p0 => aap.page_name, 
        p1 => aap.application_id,
        p2 => aap.page_id,
        p3 => substr(msglvl1.max_message,1,100),
        p4 => msglvl1.page_view_id,
        p5 => msglvl1.message_level) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Page `%0` (app %1, page %2) has a critical error', 
        p0 => aap.page_name, 
        p1 => aap.application_id,
        p2 => aap.page_id) issue_title,
       aap.page_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aap.page_name,
       aap.page_mode,
       msglvl1.max_message,
       msglvl1.page_view_id,
       msglvl1.message_level
from msglvl1 
inner join apex_application_pages aap on msglvl1.application_id = aap.application_id
                                      and msglvl1.page_id = aap.page_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aap.application_id
where aap.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION: Looking for pages associated with message\_level 1 issues logged in apex\_debug\_messages
FIX: Once the page critical error is resolved, run the page in debug mode to resolve the error

TEST_NAME: Page branches should be available
QUERY_CLOB:
with std as (
    select case when months_between (sysdate, apb.last_updated_on) > svt_preferences.get_preference ('AST_CLEANUP_DELAY')
                then case when apb.condition_type = 'Never'
                          then 'NEVERPAGEBRANCH'
                          end
                end child_code,
           apb.condition_type,
           apb.application_id,
           apb.page_id,
           apb.branch_name element_name,
           apb.last_updated_by,
           apb.last_updated_on,
           apb.build_option,
           abo.build_option_status,
           abo.status_on_export,
	         apb.workspace
    from apex_application_page_branches apb
    inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.application_id = apb.application_id
                                          and aap.page_id = apb.page_id
    left outer join apex_application_build_options abo on abo.application_id = aap.application_id 
                                                       and abo.build_option_name = aap.build_option
    where apb.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
	  and coalesce(abo.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
)
select case when std.child_code is null 
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       std.application_id,
       std.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       case when std.child_code is not null 
            then apex_string.format('%0 (page %1, app %2) should be made available or deleted. It has been unavailable since `%4`',
                          p0 => case when std.child_code = 'NEVERPAGEBRANCH'
                                     then 'Branch with Never condition `'||std.element_name||'`'
                                     when std.child_code = 'NEVERPAGECOMP'
                                     then 'Computation with Never condition `'||std.element_name||'`'
                                     when std.child_code = 'NEVERPAGEDA'
                                     then 'Dynamic Action with Never condition `'||std.element_name||'`'
                                     end,
                          p1 => std.page_id,
                          p2 => std.application_id,
                          p4 => to_char(std.last_updated_on, 'DD-MON-YY')
                        ) 
            end validation_failure_message,
       case when std.child_code is not null 
            then apex_string.format('%0 (page %1, app %2) has been unavailable for too long',
                          p0 => case when std.child_code = 'NEVERPAGEBRANCH'
                                     then 'Branch with Never condition `'||std.element_name||'`'
                                     end,
                          p1 => std.page_id,
                          p2 => std.application_id,
                          p4 => to_char(std.last_updated_on, 'DD-MON-YY')
                        ) 
            end issue_title,
	     std.child_code,
       std.element_name,
			 std.page_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
			 std.workspace
from std
EXPLANATION: Page branches, computations and dynamic actions should be available : \* NEVERPAGEBRANCH : Page branches that have had their Server-Side Condition set to "Never" (for whatever reason), should be removed. Including these items/regions just creates unnecessary app bloat.
FIX: *   Make available or remove

TEST_NAME: Page dynamic actions should be available
QUERY_CLOB:
with std as (
    select case when months_between (sysdate, apd.last_updated_on) > svt_preferences.get_preference ('AST_CLEANUP_DELAY')
                then case when apd.condition_type = 'Never'
                          then 'NEVERPAGEDA'
                          end
                end child_code,
           apd.condition_type,
           apd.application_id,
           apd.page_id,
           apd.dynamic_action_name element_name,

	         apd.workspace
    from apex_application_page_da apd
    inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.application_id = apd.application_id
                                          and aap.page_id = apd.page_id
    left outer join apex_application_build_options abo on abo.application_id = aap.application_id 
                                                       and abo.build_option_name = aap.build_option
    where apd.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
	  and coalesce(abo.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
)
select case when std.child_code is null 
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       std.application_id,
       std.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       case when std.child_code is not null 
            then apex_string.format('%0 (page %1, app %2) should be made available or deleted. It has been unavailable since `%4`',
                          p0 => case when std.child_code = 'NEVERPAGEBRANCH'
                                     then 'Branch with Never condition `'||std.element_name||'`'
                                     when std.child_code = 'NEVERPAGECOMP'
                                     then 'Computation with Never condition `'||std.element_name||'`'

                                     end,

                          p2 => std.application_id,
                          p4 => to_char(std.last_updated_on, 'DD-MON-YY')
                        ) 
            end validation_failure_message,
       case when std.child_code is not null 
            then apex_string.format('%0 (page %1, app %2) has been unavailable for too long',
                          p0 => case when std.child_code = 'NEVERPAGEBRANCH'
                                     then 'Branch with Never condition `'||std.element_name||'`'
                                     end,
                          p1 => std.page_id,
                          p2 => std.application_id,
                          p4 => to_char(std.last_updated_on, 'DD-MON-YY')
                        ) 
            end issue_title,
	     std.child_code,
       std.element_name,
			 std.page_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
			 std.workspace
from std
EXPLANATION: NEVERPAGEDA : Page dynamic actions that have had their Server-Side Condition set to "Never" (for whatever reason), should be removed. Including these items/regions just creates unnecessary app bloat.
FIX: *   Make available or remove

TEST_NAME: Pages should have valid build options
QUERY_CLOB:
select 
a90.pass_yn,
a90.application_id,
a90.child_code,
a90.page_id,
a90.page_name,
a90.created_by,
a90.created_on,
a90.last_updated_by, 
a90.last_updated_on,
case when a90.child_code = 'VAL_PAGE_BUILD'
     then apex_string.format(p_message => 
     q'^Invalid build_option (%0 / %1)^',
     p0 => a90.build_option,
     p1 => a90.build_option_status
     )
     when a90.child_code = 'PAGE_BUILD_ABUSE'
     then apex_string.format(p_message => 
     q'^Excluded by Build Option for too long (%0 / %1)^',
     p0 => a90.build_option,
     p1 => a90.build_option_status
     )
     end as validation_failure_message,
case when a90.child_code = 'VAL_PAGE_BUILD'
     then apex_string.format(p_message => 
     q'^Invalid build_option: %0 / %1 (app %2, page %3)^',
     p0 => a90.build_option,
     p1 => a90.build_option_status,
     p2 => a90.application_id,
     p3 => a90.page_id
     )
     when a90.child_code = 'PAGE_BUILD_ABUSE'
     then apex_string.format(p_message => 
     q'^Excluded by Build Option for too long: %0 / %1 (app %2, page %3)^',
     p0 => a90.build_option,
     p1 => a90.build_option_status,
     p2 => a90.application_id,
     p3 => a90.page_id
     )
     end as issue_title,
a90.page_id component_id,
null parent_component_id,
a90.workspace
from (
     select
     case when bo.status_on_export = 'Exclude'
          then case when aap.last_updated_on is null 
                    then 'N'
                    when months_between (sysdate, aap.last_updated_on) > svt_preferences.get_preference ('AST_CLEANUP_DELAY')

                    then 'N'
                    else 'Y'
                    end
          when aap.build_option is null
          then 'Y'
          when validate_conversion(aap.build_option as number) = 1 
          then 'N'
          else 'Y'
          end pass_yn,
     aap.application_id,
     case when bo.status_on_export = 'Exclude'
          then case when aap.last_updated_on is null 
                    then 'PAGE_BUILD_ABUSE'
                    when months_between (sysdate, aap.last_updated_on) > svt_preferences.get_preference ('AST_CLEANUP_DELAY')
                    then 'PAGE_BUILD_ABUSE'
                    end
          when aap.build_option is null
          then null
          when validate_conversion(aap.build_option as number) = 1 
          then 'VAL_PAGE_BUILD'
          end child_code,
     aap.page_id,
     aap.page_name,
     aap.build_option,
     bo.build_option_status,
	   bo.status_on_export,
     aap.created_by,
     aap.created_on,
     aap.last_updated_by, 
     aap.last_updated_on,
	   aap.workspace
     from apex_application_pages aap
     inner join v_apex_applications aa on  aa.application_id = aap.application_id
                                       and aa.availability_status != 'Unavailable'
     left join apex_application_build_options bo on aap.application_id = bo.application_id
                                                 and aap.build_option = bo.build_option_name
	   where aap.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
) a90
EXPLANATION:
\[Page builds are invalid\]

*   PAGE\_BUILD\_ABUSE : Page Excluded by Build Option for too long
*   VAL\_PAGE\_BUILD : The build on this page is in an invalid state
FIX:
*   PAGE\_BUILD\_ABUSE : Remove the build or eliminate the page
*   VAL\_PAGE\_BUILD : Remove the build option.

TEST_NAME: List entries should have valid build options
QUERY_CLOB:
select 
a80.pass_yn,
a80.application_id,
null page_id,
a80.child_code,
a80.created_on,
a80.created_by,
a80.last_updated_by, 
a80.last_updated_on,
case when a80.child_code = 'VAL_BUILD_LIST_ENTRY'
     then apex_string.format(p_message => 
     q'^List entry (%3,%2) in list (%1, %0) has an invalid build option: %4 / %5^',
     p0 => a80.component_id,
     p1 => a80.list_name,
     p2 => a80.entry_text,
     p3 => a80.entry_target,
     p4 => a80.build_option,
     p5 => a80.build_option_status
     )
     when a80.child_code = 'LIST_ENTRY_BUILD_ABUSE'
     then apex_string.format(p_message => 
     q'^List entry (%3,%2) in list (%1, %0) Excluded by build option for too long: %4 / %5^',
     p0 => a80.component_id,
     p1 => a80.list_name,
     p2 => a80.entry_text,
     p3 => a80.entry_target,
     p4 => a80.build_option,
     p5 => a80.build_option_status
     )
     end as validation_failure_message,
case when a80.child_code = 'VAL_BUILD_LIST_ENTRY'
     then apex_string.format(p_message => 
     q'^Invalid build option for list entry (%2) in list (%1) in app %3^',
     p0 => a80.component_id,
     p1 => a80.list_name,
     p2 => a80.entry_text,
     p3 => a80.application_id
     )
     when a80.child_code = 'LIST_ENTRY_BUILD_ABUSE'
     then apex_string.format(p_message => 
     q'^List entry (%2) Excluded by Build Option for too long - in list (%1) in app %3^',
     p0 => a80.component_id,
     p1 => a80.list_name,
     p2 => a80.entry_text,
     p3 => a80.application_id
     )
     end as issue_title,
a80.component_id,
a80.parent_component_id,
a80.workspace
from (
     select
     case when bo.status_on_export = 'Exclude'
          then case when ale.last_updated_on is null 
                    then 'N'
                    when months_between (sysdate, ale.last_updated_on) > svt_preferences.get_preference ('AST_CLEANUP_DELAY')
                    then 'N'
                    else 'Y'
                    end
          when ale.build_option is null
          then 'Y'
          when validate_conversion(ale.build_option as number) = 1 
          then 'N'
          else 'Y'
          end pass_yn,
     ale.application_id,
     case when bo.status_on_export = 'Exclude'
          then case when ale.last_updated_on is null 
                    then 'LIST_ENTRY_BUILD_ABUSE'
                    when months_between (sysdate, ale.last_updated_on) > svt_preferences.get_preference ('AST_CLEANUP_DELAY')
                    then 'LIST_ENTRY_BUILD_ABUSE'
                    end
          when ale.build_option is null
          then null
          when validate_conversion(ale.build_option as number) = 1 
          then 'VAL_BUILD_LIST_ENTRY'
          end child_code,
     ale.list_entry_id component_id,
     ale.list_entry_parent_id parent_component_id,
     ale.list_name,
     ale.entry_text,
     ale.entry_target,
     ale.build_option,
     aa.created_on,
     aa.created_by,
     ale.last_updated_by, 
     ale.last_updated_on,
     bo.build_option_status,
	   bo.status_on_export,
	   ale.workspace
     from apex_application_list_entries ale
     inner join v_apex_applications aa on  ale.application_id = aa.application_id
                                       and aa.availability_status != 'Unavailable'
     left join apex_application_build_options bo on  ale.application_id = bo.application_id
                                                 and ale.build_option = bo.build_option_name
	   where ale.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
) a80
EXPLANATION:
\[List Build Entries are invalid\]

*   LIST\_ENTRY\_BUILD\_ABUSE : List Entry Excluded by Build Option for too long
*   VAL\_BUILD\_LIST\_ENTRY : The build option on this list entry is in an invalid state
FIX:
*   LIST\_ENTRY\_BUILD\_ABUSE : Remove the build or eliminate the page
*   VAL\_BUILD\_LIST\_ENTRY : Remove or replace the build option

TEST_NAME: Applications are available
QUERY_CLOB:
select a2.pass_yn, 
       a2.application_id, 
			 null page_id,
       a2.application_group,
       a2.availability_status,
       a2.created_by, 
       a2.created_on, 
       a2.last_updated_by, 
       a2.last_updated_on,
       case when a2.pass_yn = 'N'
            then issue_desc||' (this is only acceptable temporarily).'
            end validation_failure_message,
       case when a2.pass_yn = 'N'
            then issue_desc

            end issue_title,
			a2.application_id component_id,
      null parent_component_id,
			a2.workspace
from (
     select 
     case when aa.application_group = 'TO BE ARCHIVED' or aa.availability_status = 'Unavailable'
          then 'N'
          else 'Y'
          end pass_yn,
     aa.application_id,
     aa.application_group,
     aa.availability_status,
     aa.authorization_scheme,
     aa.created_by, 
     aa.created_on, 
     aa.last_updated_by, 
     aa.last_updated_on,
     apex_string.format(p_message => q'^Application %0 is unavailable^',
                        p0 => aa.application_id) issue_desc,
     aa.workspace
     from v_apex_applications aa
	   where aa.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
) a2
EXPLANATION: APEX applications should be available and active : Workspaces should be populated by active applications
FIX: Either make the application available or archive it (delete it)

TEST_NAME: Themes should be specific numbers and subscribed
QUERY_CLOB:
with std as (select aats.theme_number, 
                    aats.subscribed_from, 
                    aats.is_subscribed,
                    case when aats.theme_number not in (42,1000)
                            then 'WRONGTHEME'
                            when aats.subscribed_from is null 
                            then 'NOSUBSCRIPTION'
                            when aats.theme_number = 1000
                            then case when aats.subscribed_from != '10000. Redwood'
                                      then 'WRONGSUBSCRIPTION'
                                      end
                            else null
                            end child_code, 
                    aats.application_id, 
                    null page_id,
                    aats.created_by,
                    aats.created_on,
                    aats.last_updated_by,
                    aats.last_updated_on,
                    aats.theme_style_id component_id, 
                    null parent_component_id,
						        aats.workspace
            from apex_application_theme_styles aats
						where aats.is_current = 'Yes'
						and aats.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE'))
select case when std.child_code is not null 
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,
       std.application_id, 
       std.page_id,
       std.created_by,
       std.created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       case when std.child_code is not null 
            then apex_string.format('The theme of App %0 %1',
                          p0 => std.application_id,
                          p1 => case when std.child_code = 'WRONGTHEME'
                                     then 'is not an approved theme number. The theme number is '||std.theme_number||' but should be 42 or 1000'
                                     when std.child_code = 'NOSUBSCRIPTION'
                                     then 'is not subscribed to a master theme. All themes should be subscribed to a master theme'
                                     when std.child_code = 'WRONGSUBSCRIPTION'
                                     then 'is not subscribed to the wrong master theme (`'||std.subscribed_from||'`). It should be subscribed to `10000. Redwood`'
                                     end
                ) 
            end validation_failure_message, 
       case when std.child_code is not null 
            then apex_string.format('The theme of App %0 %1',
                          p0 => std.application_id,
                          p1 => case when std.child_code = 'WRONGTHEME'
                                     then 'is not an approved theme number'
                                     when std.child_code = 'NOSUBSCRIPTION'
                                     then 'is not subscribed to a master theme'
                                     when std.child_code = 'WRONGSUBSCRIPTION'
                                     then 'is not subscribed to the wrong master theme'
                                     end
                ) 
            end issue_title,
       std.child_code, 
       std.component_id, 
       std.parent_component_id,
			 std.workspace
from std
EXPLANATION:
Themes should be subscribed and be 42 or 1000 : \* NOSUBSCRIPTION : All app themes should be subscribed to a master

*   THEME\_SUBSCRIPTION : Apps with Redwood should be subscribed to app 1000
*   WRONGTHEME : The only approved theme numbers are 42 and 1000
FIX: *   NOSUBSCRIPTION : Restore theme subscription

TEST_NAME: Pages should limit their content
QUERY_CLOB:
with tmr as (select workspace, application_id, page_id, count(*) region_count
            from apex_application_page_regions
            having count(*) >= 50
            group by workspace, application_id, page_id)
select 'N'  pass_yn,
       tmr.application_id,
       tmr.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aap.last_updated_by,
       aap.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Page %0 (app %1) has %2 regions. It is not recommended to have more than 20. Consider dividing the content between several pages.',
                          p0 => tmr.application_id,
                          p1 => tmr.page_id,
                          p2 => tmr.region_count) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Page %0 (app %1) has too many regions',
                          tmr.application_id,
                          tmr.page_id) issue_title,
       tmr.region_count,
			 aap.build_option,
       abo.build_option_status,
       abo.status_on_export,
       tmr.page_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
			 tmr.workspace
from tmr
inner join apex_application_pages aap on  tmr.application_id = aap.application_id
                                      and tmr.page_id = aap.page_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options abo on abo.application_id = aap.application_id 
                                                   and abo.build_option_name = aap.build_option
where tmr.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(abo.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION: A page should not have more than 20 regions : Most reasonably complex pages should have no more than 20 regions per page. Only in extremely rare conditions should a page have more than 50 regions. Pages with more than 50 regions should be refactored into multiple pages.
FIX: Consider dividing the content between several pages

	         pss.workspace
    from apex_appl_page_search_sources pss
	  where pss.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
)
select case when std.child_code is null 
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,

       std.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,

            then apex_string.format('%0 (page %1, app %2) should be made available or deleted. It has been unavailable since `%4`',

                        ) 
            end issue_title,

     std.element_name,
		 std.component_id,
		 null parent_component_id,
		 std.workspace
from std

TEST_NAME: Page computations should be available
QUERY_CLOB:
with std as (
    select case when months_between (sysdate, apc.last_updated_on) > svt_preferences.get_preference ('AST_CLEANUP_DELAY')
                then case when apc.condition_type = 'Never'
                          then 'NEVERPAGECOMP'
                          end
                end child_code,
           apc.condition_type,
           apc.application_id,
           apc.page_id,
           apc.computation element_name,
           apc.last_updated_by,
           apc.last_updated_on,
           apc.build_option,
           abo.build_option_status,
           abo.status_on_export,
	         apc.workspace
    from apex_application_page_comp apc 
    inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.application_id = apc.application_id
                                          and aap.page_id = apc.page_id
    left outer join apex_application_build_options abo on abo.application_id = aap.application_id 
                                                       and abo.build_option_name = aap.build_option
    where apc.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
	  and coalesce(abo.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
)
select case when std.child_code is null 
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       std.application_id,
       std.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       case when std.child_code is not null 
            then apex_string.format('%0 (page %1, app %2) should be made available or deleted. It has been unavailable since `%4`',
                          p0 => case when std.child_code = 'NEVERPAGEBRANCH'
                                     then 'Branch with Never condition `'||std.element_name||'`'
                                     when std.child_code = 'NEVERPAGECOMP'
                                     then 'Computation with Never condition `'||std.element_name||'`'
                                     when std.child_code = 'NEVERPAGEDA'
                                     then 'Dynamic Action with Never condition `'||std.element_name||'`'
                                     end,
                          p1 => std.page_id,
                          p2 => std.application_id,
                          p4 => to_char(std.last_updated_on, 'DD-MON-YY')
                        ) 
            end validation_failure_message,
       case when std.child_code is not null 
            then apex_string.format('%0 (page %1, app %2) has been unavailable for too long',
                          p0 => case when std.child_code = 'NEVERPAGEBRANCH'
                                     then 'Branch with Never condition `'||std.element_name||'`'
                                     end,
                          p1 => std.page_id,
                          p2 => std.application_id,
                          p4 => to_char(std.last_updated_on, 'DD-MON-YY')
                        ) 
            end issue_title,
	     std.child_code,
       std.element_name,
			 std.page_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
			 std.workspace
from std

TEST_NAME: Application has Authorization Scheme
QUERY_CLOB:
select a1.pass_yn, 
       a1.application_id,  
			 null child_code,
       a1.authorization_scheme,
			 null page_id,
       a1.created_by, 
       a1.created_on, 
       a1.last_updated_by, 
       a1.last_updated_on,
       case when a1.pass_yn = 'N'
            then issue_desc
            end as validation_failure_message,
       case when a1.pass_yn = 'N'
            then issue_desc
            end as issue_title,
			 null component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
			 a1.workspace
from (
    select 
    case when aa.authorization_scheme is null
        then 'N'
        else 'Y'
        end as pass_yn,
    aa.application_id,
    aa.authorization_scheme,
    aa.created_by, 
    aa.created_on, 
    aa.last_updated_by, 
    aa.last_updated_on,
    apex_string.format( p_message => q'^Application %0 is missing an Authorization scheme^',
                        p0        => aa.application_id
    ) issue_desc,
	  aa.workspace
    from v_apex_applications aa
    where aa.availability_status != 'Unavailable'
) a1
EXPLANATION:
\[Applications have authorization schemes\]  
Applications should have application-level authorization schemes as a matter of best-practice
FIX: Specify an authorization scheme for your application. Application authorization schemes are defined for an application for the purpose of controlling access. Setting a required authorization scheme here at the application level will require all pages of the application to pass the defined authorization check.

TEST_NAME: Application Pages should have Authorization Schemes
QUERY_CLOB:
with origin_auth as (select 
                         spu.destination_app_id, spu.destination_page_id
                         , listagg(distinct spu.element_authorization       ,'/' on overflow truncate with count) within group (order by spu.element_authorization) origin_element_authorization
                         , listagg(distinct spu.parent_element_authorization,'/' on overflow truncate with count) within group (order by spu.parent_element_authorization) origin_parent_element_authorization
                         , listagg(distinct spu.page_authorization          ,'/' on overflow truncate with count) within group (order by spu.page_authorization) origin_page_authorization
                         from v_mv_svt spu
                         where spu.destination_app_id is not null
                         and spu.destination_page_id is not null
                         and spu.url_type not in ('BC_URL') --breadcrumbs cause a lot of complexity in this context
                         group by spu.destination_app_id, spu.destination_page_id
                    ),
     a40 as (
          select 
          case when aap.page_requires_authentication = 'Yes'
               and aap.authorization_scheme is null
               then 'N'
               else 'Y'
               end as pass_yn, 
          aap.application_id,
          aap.page_id, 
          aap.page_name, 
          aap.page_access_protection, 
          aap.page_mode,
          aap.page_requires_authentication,
          apex_string.format('%0:%1:%2:%3', oa.origin_element_authorization,oa.origin_parent_element_authorization, oa.origin_page_authorization, aa.authorization_scheme) origin_authorizations,
          aap.build_option,
          bo.build_option_status,
			    bo.status_on_export,
          oa.origin_element_authorization,
          oa.origin_parent_element_authorization origin_parent_elemnt_authztn, 
          oa.origin_page_authorization, 
          aa.authorization_scheme app_authorization_scheme,
          aap.created_by, 
          aap.created_on, 
          aap.last_updated_by, 
          aap.last_updated_on,
			    aap.workspace
          from apex_application_pages aap
          inner join v_apex_applications aa on aap.application_id = aa.application_id
                                        and aa.availability_status != 'Unavailable'
          left join apex_application_build_options bo on aap.application_id = bo.application_id
                                                  and aap.build_option = bo.build_option_name
          left join origin_auth oa on oa.destination_app_id = aap.application_id
                                   and oa.destination_page_id = aap.page_id
          where aap.page_id != 0
          and (bo.status_on_export != 'Exclude' or bo.build_option_status is null)
     )
select a40.pass_yn, 
       a40.application_id,
			 null child_code,
       a40.page_id, 
       a40.page_name, 
       a40.page_access_protection, 
       a40.page_mode,
       a40.page_requires_authentication,
       a40.origin_authorizations,
       a40.build_option,
       a40.build_option_status,
       a40.origin_element_authorization,
       a40.origin_parent_elemnt_authztn, 
       a40.origin_page_authorization, 
       a40.app_authorization_scheme,
       a40.created_by, 
       a40.created_on, 
       a40.last_updated_by, 
       a40.last_updated_on,
       case when a40.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format(p_message => 
            q'^Page %10 is missing an authorization scheme. 
            • Page Access Protection: %0
            • Page Mode: %1
            • Page Requires Authentication: %2
            • Origin Authorizations: %3 
            %4 
            %5^',
            p0 => a40.page_access_protection, 
            p1 => a40.page_mode,
            p2 => a40.page_requires_authentication,
            p3 => a40.origin_authorizations,
            p4 => case when a40.build_option is not null
                       then '• Build Option: '||a40.build_option
                       end,
            p5 => case when a40.build_option_status is not null
                       then '• Build status: '||a40.build_option_status
                       end,
            p6 => a40.origin_element_authorization,
            p7 => a40.origin_parent_elemnt_authztn, 
            p8 => a40.origin_page_authorization, 
            p9 => a40.app_authorization_scheme,
            p10 => a40.page_id
            )
            end as validation_failure_message,
       case when a40.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format(p_message => 
            q'^Page %0 (app %1) is missing an authorization scheme^',
            p0 => a40.page_id, 
            p1 => a40.application_id
            )
            end as issue_title,
			 null component_id,
			 null parent_component_id,
			 a40.workspace
from a40
EXPLANATION: APEX pages should have authorization : Application pages should have authorization schemes
FIX:
Select an authorization scheme applied to the page. Authorization schemes are defined at the application-level and can be applied to many elements within the application.

An authorization scheme is evaluated either once for each application session (at session creation), or once for each page view. If the selected authorization scheme evaluates to **TRUE**, then the page displays and is subject to other defined conditions. If it evaluates to **FALSE**, then the page does not display and an error message displays.

TEST_NAME: HTML should be escaped in IR Columns
QUERY_CLOB:
select a20.pass_yn, 
       a20.application_id,
       a20.page_id,
       a20.region_id, 
       a20.region_name,
       a20.report_type,
       a20.column_alias,
       a20.report_label,
       a20.created_by, 
       a20.created_on, 
       a20.updated_by last_updated_by, 
       a20.updated_on last_updated_on,
       case when a20.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format(p_message => q'^Region `%1` is escaping HTML for column `%3`/`%4` (Region id : %0, type : %2).^',
                                    p0 => a20.region_id, 
                                    p1 => a20.region_name,
                                    p2 => a20.report_type,
                                    p3 => a20.column_alias,
                                    p4 => a20.report_label
                                    )
            end as validation_failure_message,
       case when a20.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format(p_message => q'^Region `%1` (app %0, page %2) is escaping HTML for column `%4`^',
                                    p0 => a20.application_id, 
                                    p1 => a20.region_name,
                                    p2 => a20.page_id,
                                    p3 => a20.column_alias,
                                    p4 => a20.report_label
                                    )
            end as issue_title,
       a20.component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
			 a20.workspace
from (
     select 
     case when ic1.display_text_as = 'WITHOUT_MODIFICATION'
          then case when ic1.format_mask like 'PCT_GRAPH%' --the percent graph column type does not escape apparently
                    then 'Y'
                    else 'N'
                    end
          else 'Y'
          end as pass_yn,
     ic1.application_id,
     ic1.region_id, 
     ic1.page_id,
     ic1.region_name, 
     'IR' report_type,
     ic1.column_alias,
     ic1.report_label,
     coalesce(ic1.created_by, app.created_by) created_by, 
     coalesce(ic1.created_on, app.created_on) created_on, 
     coalesce(ic1.updated_by, app.last_updated_by) updated_by, 
     coalesce(ic1.updated_on, app.last_updated_on) updated_on,
     ic1.column_id component_id,
	   ic1.workspace
     from apex_application_page_ir_col ic1
     inner join apex_application_pages app on  app.page_id = ic1.page_id
                                           and app.application_id = ic1.application_id
     inner join v_apex_applications aa on ic1.application_id = aa.application_id
                                       and aa.availability_status != 'Unavailable'
	   where ic1.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
) a20
EXPLANATION: IR Report columns should escape HTML : Avoid turning the "Escape special characters" setting off on report columns
FIX: To prevent Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attacks, always set this attribute to **On**. If you need to render HTML tags stored in the page item or in the entries of a list of values, you can set this flag to **Off**. In such cases, you should take additional precautions to ensure any user input to such fields are properly escaped when entered and before saving.

TEST_NAME: Application Item incorrectly prefixed

select a3.pass_yn,
       a3.application_id,
			 null page_id,

       a3.item_name,

       case when a3.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format(p_message => q'^%1, %2 application item (id: %0), should begin with 'G_' and 'A_'^',

                                    p1 => a3.item_name,

            then apex_string.format(p_message => q'^%0 in app %1 is incorrectly named^',

			a3.component_id,

TEST_NAME: Form pages require authentication and have access protection
QUERY_CLOB:
with unrestricted_pg_itms as (
      select application_id, page_id, listagg(item_name,':' on overflow truncate '...') within group (order by item_name) page_item_list
            from apex_application_page_items
            where item_protection_level = 'Unrestricted'
            group by application_id, page_id
), a30 as (
      select 
      case when aap.page_requires_authentication = 'No'
      then 'N'
      when aap.page_access_protection = 'Unrestricted'
      then 'N'
      else 'Y'
      end as pass_yn,
      aap.application_id,
      aap.page_id,
      aap.page_name,
      aap.page_requires_authentication, 
      aap.page_access_protection,
      aap.build_option,
      bo.build_option_status,
      pi.page_item_list,
      aap.created_by, 
      aap.created_on, 
      aap.last_updated_by, 
      aap.last_updated_on,
	    bo.status_on_export,
	    aap.workspace
      from apex_application_pages aap
      inner join v_apex_applications aa on aa.application_id = aap.application_id
                                    and aa.availability_status != 'Unavailable'
      inner join unrestricted_pg_itms pi on aap.application_id = pi.application_id
                                    and aap.page_id = pi.page_id
      left join apex_application_build_options bo on aap.application_id = bo.application_id
                                                and aap.build_option = bo.build_option_name
      where aap.page_id not in (9999,101)
      and aap.page_name not in ('Login Page')
      and (bo.status_on_export != 'Exclude' or bo.build_option_status is null)
	    and aap.application_id = 17000033
)
select a30.pass_yn,
       a30.application_id,
			 null child_code,
       a30.page_id,
       a30.page_name,
       a30.page_requires_authentication, 
       a30.page_access_protection,
       a30.build_option,
       a30.build_option_status,
       a30.page_item_list,
       a30.created_by, 
       a30.created_on, 
       a30.last_updated_by, 
       a30.last_updated_on,
       case when a30.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format(p_message => 
            q'^"Page requires_authentication" attribute = %0
               "Page access protection" attribute = %1
               "Build option" attribute = %2
               "Build option status" attribute = %3
                Page items  = %4
            ^',
                                    p0 => a30.page_requires_authentication,

            q'^Page %0 (app %1) should require authentication and should not have access protection set to 'Unrestricted'.^',
                                    p0 => a30.page_id, 
                                    p1 => a30.application_id
                                    )

TEST_NAME: Breadcrumb hierarchy should match nav menu
QUERY_CLOB:
with bce as (select application_id, element_label, element_id, parent_element_name, 
                opt_parent_element_id, destination_app_id, destination_page_id, parent_element_id, last_updated_by, last_updated_on, workspace
                from mv_svt_bc_entries),
    bcep as (select application_id, element_label, element_id, destination_app_id, destination_page_id, parent_element_id, workspace
                from mv_svt_bc_entries),
    nle as (select spu.application_id, spu.element_id, spu.parent_element_id, spu.parent_element_name, spu.destination_page_id, spu.opt_parent_element_id, spu.workspace
            from mv_svt_list_entries spu
            inner join apex_applications aa on spu.application_id = aa.application_id
                                            and spu.parent_element_name = aa.navigation_list),
    nlep as (select spu.application_id, spu.element_id, spu.parent_element_id, spu.parent_element_name, spu.destination_page_id, spu.opt_parent_element_id, spu.workspace
            from mv_svt_list_entries spu
            inner join apex_applications aa on spu.application_id = aa.application_id
                                            and spu.parent_element_name = aa.navigation_list),
    std as (select  bce.application_id, 
                    bce.element_label, 
                    bce.parent_element_name,
                    bce.destination_page_id bc_target_page_id,
                    bcep.destination_page_id bc_parent_target_page_id,
                    nle.destination_page_id le_target_page_id,
                    nlep.destination_page_id le_parent_target_page_id,
                    bce.element_id component_id,
                    bce.parent_element_id parent_component_id,
                    bce.last_updated_by, 
                    bce.last_updated_on,
                    bce.workspace
                    from bce
                    inner join bcep on bce.opt_parent_element_id = bcep.element_id
                                    and bce.parent_element_id = bcep.parent_element_id
                                    and bce.application_id = bcep.application_id
                    left outer join nle on nle.application_id = bce.application_id
                                        and nle.destination_page_id = bce.destination_page_id
                    left outer join nlep on nlep.application_id = bce.application_id
                                        and nlep.element_id = nle.opt_parent_element_id
                    where bce.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
            )
select case when aap.page_template like 'AO%'
            then 'Y'
            when std.bc_parent_target_page_id = std.le_parent_target_page_id
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn, 
       std.application_id, 
       null page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format (
            'The parent breadcrumb entry of `%0` (app %1, page %2) targets page %3. %4',
            p0 =>  std.element_label,
            p1 => std.application_id,
            p2 => std.bc_target_page_id,
            p3 => std.bc_parent_target_page_id,
            p4 => case when std.le_target_page_id is null 
                       then 'There is no corresponding nav menu entry'
                       else case when std.le_parent_target_page_id is null 
                                then 'The corresponding nav list entry has no parent'
                                else 'The parent nav list entry for the same page targets page '||std.le_parent_target_page_id
                                end
                       end
       ) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format (
            'The parent breadcrumb entry of `%0` (app %1, page %2) does not match the nav menu entry',
            p0 =>  std.element_label,
            p1 => std.application_id,
            p2 => std.bc_target_page_id
       ) issue_title,
       std.component_id, 
       std.parent_component_id,
       std.element_label, 
       std.parent_element_name,
       std.bc_target_page_id,
       std.bc_parent_target_page_id,
       std.le_target_page_id,
       std.le_parent_target_page_id,
       aap.page_template,
			 std.workspace
from std
inner join apex_application_pages aap on  aap.application_id = std.application_id
                                      and aap.page_id = std.bc_target_page_id
																			and aap.page_template not like 'AO%'
inner join apex_application_pages aap2 on  aap2.application_id = std.application_id
                                       and aap2.page_id = std.bc_parent_target_page_id
                                       and aap2.page_template not like 'AO%'
EXPLANATION: Breadcrumb hierarchies should match navigation menu hierarchies
FIX: Correct the hierarchies

TEST_NAME: SVT Application Pages should have Authorization Schemes
QUERY_CLOB:
with origin_auth as (select 
                         spu.destination_app_id, spu.destination_page_id
                         , listagg(distinct spu.element_authorization       ,'/' on overflow truncate with count) within group (order by spu.element_authorization) origin_element_authorization
                         , listagg(distinct spu.parent_element_authorization,'/' on overflow truncate with count) within group (order by spu.parent_element_authorization) origin_parent_element_authorization
                         , listagg(distinct spu.page_authorization          ,'/' on overflow truncate with count) within group (order by spu.page_authorization) origin_page_authorization
                         from v_mv_svt spu
                         where spu.destination_app_id is not null
                         and spu.destination_page_id is not null
                         and spu.url_type not in ('BC_URL') --breadcrumbs cause a lot of complexity in this context
                         group by spu.destination_app_id, spu.destination_page_id
                    ),
     a40 as (
          select 
          case when aap.page_requires_authentication = 'Yes'
               and aap.authorization_scheme is null
               then 'N'
			 				 when aap.authorization_scheme = 'APPLICATION SENTRY'
			 				 then 'N'
               else 'Y'
               end as pass_yn, 
          aap.application_id,
          aap.page_id, 
          aap.page_name, 
          aap.page_access_protection, 
          aap.page_mode,
          aap.page_requires_authentication,
          apex_string.format('%0:%1:%2:%3', oa.origin_element_authorization,oa.origin_parent_element_authorization, oa.origin_page_authorization, aa.authorization_scheme) origin_authorizations,
          aap.build_option,
          bo.build_option_status,
			    bo.status_on_export,
          oa.origin_element_authorization,
          oa.origin_parent_element_authorization origin_parent_elemnt_authztn, 
          oa.origin_page_authorization, 
          aa.authorization_scheme app_authorization_scheme,
          aap.created_by, 
          aap.created_on, 
          aap.last_updated_by, 
          aap.last_updated_on,
			    aap.workspace
          from apex_application_pages aap
          inner join apex_applications aa on aap.application_id = aa.application_id
                                          and aa.availability_status != 'Unavailable'
          left join apex_application_build_options bo on aap.application_id = bo.application_id
                                                  and aap.build_option = bo.build_option_name
          left join origin_auth oa on oa.destination_app_id = aap.application_id
                                   and oa.destination_page_id = aap.page_id
          where aap.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
			    and aap.page_id != 0
          and (bo.status_on_export != 'Exclude' or bo.build_option_status is null)
     )
select a40.pass_yn, 
       a40.application_id,
       a40.page_id, 
       a40.page_name, 
       a40.page_access_protection, 
       a40.page_mode,
       a40.page_requires_authentication,
       a40.origin_authorizations,
       a40.build_option,
       a40.build_option_status,
       a40.origin_element_authorization,
       a40.origin_parent_elemnt_authztn, 
       a40.origin_page_authorization, 
       a40.app_authorization_scheme,
       a40.created_by, 
       a40.created_on, 
       a40.last_updated_by, 
       a40.last_updated_on,
       case when a40.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format(p_message => 
            q'^Page %10 is missing an authorization scheme. 
            • Page Access Protection: %0
            • Page Mode: %1
            • Page Requires Authentication: %2
            • Origin Authorizations: %3 
            %4 
            %5^',
            p0 => a40.page_access_protection, 
            p1 => a40.page_mode,
            p2 => a40.page_requires_authentication,
            p3 => a40.origin_authorizations,
            p4 => case when a40.build_option is not null
                       then '• Build Option: '||a40.build_option
                       end,
            p5 => case when a40.build_option_status is not null
                       then '• Build status: '||a40.build_option_status
                       end,
            p6 => a40.origin_element_authorization,
            p7 => a40.origin_parent_elemnt_authztn, 
            p8 => a40.origin_page_authorization, 
            p9 => a40.app_authorization_scheme,
            p10 => a40.page_id
            )
            end as validation_failure_message,
       case when a40.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format(p_message => 
            q'^Page %0 (app %1) is missing an authorization scheme^',
            p0 => a40.page_id, 
            p1 => a40.application_id
            )
            end as issue_title,
			 a40.page_id component_id,
			 null parent_component_id,
			 a40.workspace
from a40
where a40.application_id = 17000033
EXPLANATION: SVT Application pages should have authorization schemes for consistency and security
FIX:
Select an authorization scheme applied to the page. Authorization schemes are defined at the application-level and can be applied to many elements within the application.

An authorization scheme is evaluated either once for each application session (at session creation), or once for each page view. If the selected authorization scheme evaluates to **TRUE**, then the page displays and is subject to other defined conditions. If it evaluates to **FALSE**, then the page does not display and an error message displays.

TEST_NAME: Apps should have particular set of builds
QUERY_CLOB:
with std as (
    select aa.application_id,
       0 page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       coalesce (td.last_updated_by, do.last_updated_by) last_updated_by,
       coalesce (td.last_updated_on, do.last_updated_on) last_updated_on,
       case when td.build_option_name is null 
            then 'TO_DELETE_MISSING'
            when do.build_option_name is null
            then 'DEV_ONLY_MISSING'
            else coalesce(td.child_code,do.child_code)
            end child_code, 
       do.build_option_status do_build_option_status, 
       do.status_on_export    do_status_on_export,
       td.build_option_status td_build_option_status, 
       td.status_on_export    td_status_on_export,
	     aa.workspace
    from apex_applications aa
    left join (select 
                  case when build_option_status != 'Include'
                       then 'DEV_ONLY_EXCLUDED'
                       when status_on_export != 'Exclude'
                       then 'DEV_ONLY_INCLUDED'
                       end child_code,
                  application_id, 
                  build_option_name, 
                  build_option_status, 
                  status_on_export,
                  last_updated_by,
                  last_updated_on
            from apex_application_build_options
            where build_option_name = 'DEV_ONLY') do on aa.application_id = do.application_id
    left join (select 
                  case when build_option_status = 'Include' or status_on_export = 'Include'
                       then 'TO_DELETE_INCLUDED'
                       end child_code,
                  application_id, 
                  build_option_name, 
                  build_option_status, 
                  status_on_export,
                  last_updated_by,
                  last_updated_on
            from apex_application_build_options
            where build_option_name = 'TO_DELETE') td on aa.application_id = td.application_id
    where aa.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
)
select case when std.child_code is not null
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,
       std.application_id,
       std.page_id,
       std.created_by,
       std.created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       case when std.child_code is not null
            then apex_string.format('Application %0 %1',
                                    p0 => std.application_id,
                                    p1 => case when std.child_code = 'TO_DELETE_MISSING'
                                               then 'is missing a `TO_DELETE` build option'
                                               when std.child_code = 'DEV_ONLY_MISSING'
                                               then 'is missing a `DEV_ONLY` build option'
                                               when std.child_code = 'DEV_ONLY_EXCLUDED'
                                               then 'has a misconfigured DEV_ONLY build - it has a build option status set to `Excluded`'
                                               when std.child_code = 'DEV_ONLY_INCLUDED'
                                               then 'has a misconfigured DEV_ONLY build - it has a status on export set to `included`'
                                               when std.child_code = 'TO_DELETE_INCLUDED'
                                               then 'has a misconfigured TO_DELETE build - at least one of the statuses is set to `included`'
                                               end
                                    )
            end  validation_failure_message,
       case when std.child_code is not null
            then apex_string.format('Application %0 %1 (TO_DELETE status = %2, export = %3) (DEV_ONLY status = %4, export = %5)',
                                    p0 => std.application_id,
                                    p1 => case when std.child_code = 'TO_DELETE_MISSING'
                                               then 'is missing a `TO_DELETE` build option'
                                               when std.child_code = 'DEV_ONLY_MISSING'
                                               then 'is missing a `DEV_ONLY` build option'
                                               when std.child_code = 'DEV_ONLY_EXCLUDED'
                                               then 'has a misconfigured DEV_ONLY build - it has a build option status set to `Excluded`'
                                               when std.child_code = 'DEV_ONLY_INCLUDED'
                                               then 'has a misconfigured DEV_ONLY build - it has a status on export set to `included`'
                                               when std.child_code = 'TO_DELETE_INCLUDED'
                                               then 'has a misconfigured TO_DELETE build - at least one of the statuses is set to `included`'
                                               end,
                                    p2 => coalesce(std.td_build_option_status, 'NA'),
                                    p3 => coalesce(std.td_status_on_export, 'NA'),
                                    p4 => coalesce(std.do_build_option_status, 'NA'),
                                    p5 => coalesce(std.do_status_on_export, 'NA')
                                    )
            end issue_title,
	     std.child_code,
       std.do_build_option_status,
       std.do_status_on_export,
       std.td_build_option_status,
       std.td_status_on_export,
			 std.application_id component_id,
	     null parent_component_id,
			 std.workspace
from std
EXPLANATION:
Apps should have 'dev\_only' and 'to\_delete' builds : \* DEV\_ONLY\_EXCLUDED : The \`DEV\_ONLY\` build option, as the name suggests should be \`included\` in the dev environment

*   DEV\_ONLY\_INCLUDED : The \`DEV\_ONLY\` build has been misconfigured to include the underlying on objects on export. It should be set to exclude on export.
*   DEV\_ONLY\_MISSING : Apps should have a \`DEV\_ONLY\` build which, as the name suggests, includes the underlying objects in the dev environment, but excludes it on export. This  build option is used to flag components that are not ready for deployment
*   TO\_DELETE\_INCLUDED : The \`TO\_DELETE\` build has been misconfigured to include the underlying on objects. It should be set to exclude.
*   TO\_DELETE\_MISSING : Apps should have a \`TO\_DELETE\` build that excludes the underlying objects both in the dev environment and on export. This allows us to flag components that candidates for deletion without having to immediately delete them. If the component remains under this build for a long time, i~
FIX: Correct the build option
